translation.en: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
translation.zu: "Manje sinamagundane anezinyanga ezingu-4 angenawo ushukela ayenoshukela," wanezela.

translation.en: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
translation.zu: UDkt. Ehud Ur, uprofesa wezokwelapha eNyuvesi yaseDalhousie eHalifax, eNova Scotia kanye nosihlalo womnyango wezokwelapha nowesayensi weCanadian Diabetes Association uxwayise ngokuthi ucwaningo lusanda kuqala.

translation.en: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
translation.zu: Njengezinye izazi, unokungabaza ngokuthi isifo sikashukela singalashwa, ephawula ukuthi lokhu okutholakele akubathinti abantu abanoHlobo ike some other experts, he lukashukela.

translation.en: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
translation.zu: NgoMsombuluko, uSara Danius, unobhala wesikhathi sonke weKomiti yeNobel yeZincwadi kuyi-Akhademi yase-Sweden, umemezele obala phakathi nohlelo lomsakazo eMsakazweni we-Sveriges e-Sweden ukuthi ikomiti, njengoba lingakwazi ukufinyelela uBob Dylan ngokuqondile ngokuwina Umklomelo weNobel weZincwadi, liyeke imizamo yokumfinyelela.

translation.en: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
translation.zu: UDanius wathi, “Okwamanje asenzi lutho. Sengishayele ucingo ngaphinde ngathumela ama-imeyile kwabasondelene naye kakhulu asebenzisana nabo futhi ngathola izimpendulo ezinobungane. Okwamanje, lokho ngokuqinisekile kwanele.”

translation.en: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
translation.zu: Phambilini, isikhulu esiphezulu sakwa-Ring, u-Jamie Siminoff, sathi le nkampani yaqala ngenkathi kungezwakali ukuthi kukhona ongqongqozayo emnyango uma esesitolo sakhe esisegalaji lakhe.

translation.en: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
translation.zu: Wakhe insimbi yasemnyango yeWiFi, washo.

translation.en: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
translation.zu: USminoff uthe izintengo zanyuka ngemva kokuvela kwakhe embukwisweni we-Shark Tank ngo-2013 lapho iphaneli yohlelo yenqaba ukusekela ibhizinisi ngezimali.

translation.en: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.
translation.zu: Ekupheleni kuka-2017, iSiminoff yavela ohlelweni lokuthengisa lukamabonakude iQVC.

translation.en: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
translation.zu: U-Ring ngi wabuye waxazulula icala nenkampani ancintisana nayo yezokuphepha, i-ADT Corporation.

translation.en: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
translation.zu: Nakuba umjovo wokulinga ubonakala ukwazi ukunciphisa ukufa okubangelwa yi-Ebola, kuze kube manje, ayikho imithi eboniswe ngokucacile ukuthi ifanelekela ukulapha isifo esikhona.

translation.en: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
translation.zu: I-cocktai eyodwa nje emzimbeni, ZMapp, ekuqaleni ibonakale ithembisa ensimini, kodwa ngokocwaningo kubonisa ukuthi inomthelela omncane kunalowo obucatshwangwa ekuvimbeleni ukufa.

translation.en: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
translation.zu: Ekuhloleni kwe-PALM, i-ZMapp yasebenza njengesifaniso, okusho ukuthi ososayensi bayisebenzisa njengesiqalo sokuqhathanisa futhi baqhathanisa amanye amakhambi amathathu okwelapha nayo.

translation.en: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
translation.zu: Ukuzivocavoca Kokuqinisa Imisipha Namathambo kwaseMelika kusekela incwadi yeKomiti lama-Olimpiki laseMelika futhi kwamukela isidingo esiphelele sokuba umndeni wama-Olimpiki ukhathaze indawo ephephile yabadlali bethu bonke.

translation.en: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.
translation.zu: Sivumelana nokushiwo yi-USOC ukuthi izithakazelo zabadlali kanye namaqembu, kanye nemidlalo yabo, zingakhonzwa kangcono ngokuyaphambili ngoshintsho olunenjengo phakathi kwenhlangano yethu, kunokuthathelwa izitifiketi.

translation.en: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.
translation.zu: I-USA Gymnastics isekela uphenyo oluzimele olungaveza ukukhanya endleleni ukuhlukumeza kobukhulu obuchazwe ngesibindi yilabo abasinde kuLarry Nassar obekungenzeka kungabonwa ngayo isikhathi eside kangaka futhi yamukela noma iziphi izinguquko ezidingekayo nezifanele.

translation.en: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
translation.zu: Ezokuzivivinya komzimba zaseMelika kanye ne-USOC zinomgomo ofanayao — ukwenza umdlalo wezokuzivivinya komzimba, kanye neminye, iphephe ngangokunokwenzeka ukuba abadlali balandele amaphupho wabo endaweni ephephile, enhle kanye nenika amandla.

translation.en: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
translation.zu: Kuyo yonke iminyaka yawo-1960, uBrzezinski wasebenzela uJohn F. Kennedy njengomeluleki bese uhulumeni kaLyndon B. Johnson.

translation.en: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
translation.zu: Phakathi nokhetho luka-1976 waluleka uCarter ngemithetho yakwamanye amazwe, bese wakhonza kuyiNational Security Advisor (NSA) kusuka ngo-1977 kuya ku-1981, ethatha isikhundla sikaHenry Kissinger.

translation.en: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
translation.zu: Njenge-NSA, usize uKhatha ngokuphatha izindaba zezwe ngokuhlakanipha, njengeSivumelwano seKamu Davide, ngo-1978; ukwenza kube nobudlelwane obuvamile phakathi kweMelika neShayina ekupheleni kwawo-1970; Ushintsho lwase-Iran, olwaholela enhlekeleleni yezithunjwa zase-Iran, ngo-1979; kanye nokuhlasela kweSoviet e-Afghanistan, ngo-1979.

translation.en: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
translation.zu: Ifilimu, eno-Ryan Gosling noEmma Stone, ikhethelwe ukuwina kuzo zonke izigaba ezinkulu.

translation.en: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
translation.zu: Ihansana kanye Netshe bakhethelwa ukuthola umklomelo Womdlali Nomdlalikazi Ohamba Phambili ngokulandelana.

translation.en: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
translation.zu: Abanye abakhethiwe bahlanganisa neSithombe Esihle Kakhulu, Umqondisi Webhayisikobho, Umklami Wezimpahla, Umhleli-wefilimu, Umculo, Umklamo Womkhiqizo, Ukuhlelwa Komsindo, Ukuhlanganiswa Komsindo kanye Nombhalo weFilimu Wangempela.

translation.en: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
translation.zu: Izingoma ezimbili ezivela kuyifilimu, Ukulalela (Iziphukuphuku Eziphuphayo) kanye neDolobha leziNkanyezi, zakhethwa ukuthi zithole umklomelo wengoma yangempela ehamba phambili. Isitshudiyo se-Lionsgate sikhethwe izikhathi ezingu-26 — ukudlula noma esiphi isitshudiyo.

translation.en: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.
translation.zu: Ntambama ngeSonto, uMongameli waseMelika u-Donald Trump, esitatimendeni esikhishwe unobhala wephephandaba, umemezele ukuthi amasosha aseMelika azoshiya elaseSiriya.

translation.en: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
translation.zu: Isimemezelo senziwa ngemva kokuba u-Trump eshayele uMongameli waseTheki uRecep Tayyip Erdoğan ucingo.

translation.en: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
translation.zu: ITheki izophatha ukugada amasosha we-ISIS athunjiwe lawo, ngokwesitatimende, amazwe waseYurophu anqabe ukuwalanda.

translation.en: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
translation.zu: Lokhu akugcini nje ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi okungenani amanye ama-dinosaur ayenezimpaphe, inkolelo-mbono ebanzi kakade, kepha inikezela imininingwane imivubukulo engayinikezi ngokujwayelekile, njengombala nokuhleleka kwezinhlangothi ezintathu.

translation.en: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
translation.zu: . Ososayensi bathi iplamu lalesi silwane lalinesifuba esinsundu ngaphezulu siphaphathekile nokumibalabala emaceleni.

translation.en: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
translation.zu: Ucwaningo lunikeza nokuqonda ngokuvela kwezimpaphe ezinyonini.

translation.en: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
translation.zu: Ngenxa yokuthi izimpaphe zama-dinosaur aziso isiqu esikhule kahle, osibizwa ngokuthi i-rachis, kodwa zinezinye izici zezimpaphe — izindlendla kanye nama-barbule — abacwaningi baphethe ngokuthi i-rachis cishe bekungukwakheka kokuziphendukela kunalezinye izici.

translation.en: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
translation.zu: Ukwakheka kwezimpaphe kusikisela ukuthi bezingasetshenziselwa ukundiza kodwa kunalokho ukulawula ukushisa kanye nokuzibonakalisa. Abacwaningi basikisela ukuthi, nakuba lona kungumsila we-dinosaur encane, isampula liveza izimpaphe zendala futhi hhayi isihluphe somntwanyana.

translation.en: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.
translation.zu: Abacwaningi basikisela ukuthi, ngisho noma lona kungumsila we-dinosaur, isampula liveza izimpaphe zendala futhi hhayi isihluphe somntwanyana.

translation.en: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.
translation.zu: Ibhomu esemotweni eqhume esikhungweni samaphoyisa eGaziantep, eTheki izolo ekuseni ibulale amaphoyisa amabili futhi yalimaza abantu abanye abangaphezu kweshumi nambili.

translation.en: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.
translation.zu: Ihhovisi lombusi lithe abayishumi nesishiyagalolunye babengamaphoyisa.

translation.en: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.
translation.zu: Amaphoyisa athi asola osolwa ngokuba isosha leDaesh (ISIL) elinesikhundla ngenxa yalokhu kuhlasela.

translation.en: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.
translation.zu: Bathole ukuthi ilanga lisebenza ngezimiso eziyisisekelo njengezinye izinkanyezi: umsebenzi wezinkanyezi zonke ohlelweni kutholakale ukuthi uqondiswa ukukhanya kwazo, ukuphenduka kwazo, futhi hhayi okunye.

translation.en: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.
translation.zu: Ukukhanya nokuphenduka kusetshenziswa ndawonye ukuthola inombolo yeRossby yenkanyezi, ehlobene nokugeleza kwe-plasma.

translation.en: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.
translation.zu: Uma i-Rossby inenombolo encane, inkanyezi ayibi namandla okudonsela emuva amakhulu.

translation.en: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.
translation.zu: Phakathi naloluhambo, u-Iwasaki wahlangabezana nezinkinga kaningi.

translation.en: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
translation.zu: Ubanjwe inkunzi yizigcwelegcwele zasolwandle, wahlaselwa yinja enesifo sobuhlanya e-Tibet, wabalekela umshado e-Nepal bese waboshwa eNdiya.

translation.en: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
translation.zu: Isimiso se-802.11n sisebenza kokubili ezikhawini zokuthatheka komsindo ze-2.4Ghz kanye ne-5.0Ghz.

translation.en: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.
translation.zu: Lokhu kuzoyivumela ukuthi ihambisane nezinhlelo zakudala ze-802.11a, i-802.11b kanye ne-802.11g, uma nje isikhungo sesiteshi sinemisakazo emibili.

translation.en: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
translation.zu: Ijubane lika-802.11n liphezulu kakhulu kunelangaphambili elaligcina ejubaneni elingu-600Mbit/s.

translation.en: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.
translation.zu: UDuvall, oshadile nonezingane ezimbili ezindalaa, akazange ahlabe u-Miller umxhwele, lowo otshelwe indaba.

translation.en: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."
translation.zu: Lapho ecelwa ukuthi aphawule, u-Miller uthe, “U-Mike ukhuluma kakhulu phakathi nokuthethwa kwecala...bengizilungiselela ngakho angikuzwanga ayekusho.”

translation.en: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
translation.zu: "Sizophumelela ukunciphisa inani lomoya ogcolile ngesikali se-GDP ngezinga eliphawulekayo ngo-2020 ukusuka esilinganisweni sango-2005," kusho u-Hu.

translation.en: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.
translation.zu: Akazange alibeke inani lezanhlukaniselwano, ethi zizokwenziwa ngokomphumela womnotho waseChina.

translation.en: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."
translation.zu: UHu ukhuthaze amazwe athuthukayo "ukugwema indlela yakudala yokugcolisa kuqala bese uhlanza kamuva."

translation.en: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
translation.zu: Wanezela ukuthi “akumelwe, nokho, bacelwe bathathe ukuzibophezela okungaphezu kwesigaba sabo sentuthuko, imithwalo yemfanelo kanye namakhono.”

translation.en: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.
translation.zu: IQembu Locwaningo lase-Iraq lethule umbiko walo ngo-12,00 GMT namuhla.

translation.en: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.
translation.zu: Iyaxwayisa Akekho ongaqinisekisa ukuthi nanoma iyiphi inkambo e-Iraq okwamanje izoqeda impi yamahlelo, ubudlova obukhulayo, noma ukuthambekela ebuxakalaleni.

translation.en: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.
translation.zu: UMbiko uvula ngesicelo senkulumo-mpikiswano evulekile kanye nokwenziwa kokuvumelana eMelika ngesimiso saseNingizimu ePhakathi.

translation.en: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.
translation.zu: Umbiko ugxeka kakhulu cishe zonke izici zesimiso samanje sesiGungu sase-Iraq futhi ucela ukuba kube noshintsho olusheshayo lwenkambo.

translation.en: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
translation.zu: Okokuqala phakathi kokutusa kwayo okungu-78 ukuthi isinyathelo sokuxhumana kumelwe sithathe ngaphambi kokuphela kwalonyaka ukuvikela imingcele yase-Iraq ekungeneleni konya kanye nasekumiseni kabusha ubuhlobo bokuxhumana nomakhelwane bayo.

translation.en: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.
translation.zu: Ilungu lesigele lamanje kanye noNkosikazi kaMongameli wase-Argentina uCristina Fernandez de Kirchner umemezele ukungenela kwakhe ukhetho lokuba umongameli izolo ntambama eLa Plata, idolobha elingamakhilomitha angu-50 (amamayela angu-31) kusuka eBuenos Aires.

translation.en: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
translation.zu: UNkk. Kirchner umemezelo inhloso yakhe yokukhankasela ukuba umongameli eThiyetheni yase-Ajenthina, indawo efanayo ayisebenzisele ukuqala umkhankaso wakhe wokuba ilunga leSigele njengelunga lamanxusa esifunda sase-Buenos Aires.

translation.en: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
translation.zu: Inkulumo-mpikiswano idalwe ukuphikisana ngokuchitha imali eningi yokusiza kanye nokwakha kabusha ngemva kokudlula kweSiphepho iKatrina; leyo abesikhwama sezwe abadla ngoludala abayibize sakudlala ngokuthi “Isivumelwano sikaHlathi sase-Orleans eNtsha.”

translation.en: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.
translation.zu: Ukugxekwa okukhulu komzamo wokwakha kabusha kugxile ekuklomeliseni ukuvuselelwa kwezinkontileka ukuze baqonde ezangaphakathi zase-Washington.

translation.en: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
translation.zu: Abantu abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyishumi baye enkonzweni yomngcwabo eRoma.

translation.en: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
translation.zu: Inani labantu ababekhona lalilikhulu kangangokuba kwakungenzeki ukuba wonke umuntu angene enkonzweni yomngcwabo eSt. Peter's Square.

translation.en: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.
translation.zu: Izikrini ezinkulu eziningana zethelevishini zifakiwe ezindaweni ezihlukahlukene eRoma ukwenzela ukuthi abantu babukele umcimbi.

translation.en: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
translation.zu: Kwamanye amazwe amaningi waseNtaliyane nasemhlabeni wonke, ngokukhethekile ePholandi, ukumiswa okufanayo kwenziwe, okubukwe abantu abaningi kakhulu.

translation.en: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.
translation.zu: Abezomlando bagxeke imithetho edlule yeFBI ngokugxila emacaleni alula ukuwaxazulula, ikakhulukazi amacala okuntshontshwa kwezimoto, ngenjongo yokukhuphula izinga lokuphumelela le nkampani.

translation.en: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
translation.zu: Ukhongolose waqala ukuxhasa ngezimali uhlelo olungamanyala ngesikhwama sezwe ngo-2005 futhi wachaza ukuthi i-FBI kumelwe inikele ngezisebenzi ezingu-10 ezithombeni ezingcolile zabantu abadala.

translation.en: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
translation.zu: URobin Uthappa wenza ama-innings abe aphezulu kakhulu, wenze ama-runs awe-70 kumabhola awu-41 nje ngokushaya ama-fours awu-11 kanye nama-sixes amabini.

translation.en: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.
translation.zu: Amadoda abhethayo-bat kwikhilikithi adlalela phakathi, u-Sachin Tendulkar no-Rahul Dravid, bedlale kahle futhi benza umsebenzisano wokugijima ka-100.

translation.en: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.
translation.zu: Kodwa, ngemva kokuba kukhiswhe ukaputeni wayo, iNdiya yenze amaphuzu angu-36 kuphela ilahlekelwa amawikhethi angu-7 kuze kube sekugcineni kwengxenye yomdlalo.

translation.en: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
translation.zu: UMongameli waseMelika uJoji W. Hlathi ufike eSingapho ekuseni ngoNovemba 16, eqalisa uhambo lwakhe lweviki lokuvakashela i-Asia.

translation.en: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
translation.zu: Wabingelelwa iPhini likaNdunankulu uWong Kan Seng futhi baxoxa ngezinkinga zezentengiselwano kanye nezokuvakasha kanye noNdunankulu waseSingapore uLee Hsien Loong.

translation.en: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
translation.zu: Ngemva kweviki lokulahlekelwa okhethweni lwaphakathi nesikhathi, uBhush watshela izilaleli ngokukhulisa ezentengiselwano e-Asia.

translation.en: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
translation.zu: UNdunankulu uStephen Harper uvumile ukuthumela 'Umthetho woMoya Ohlanzekile' ukuba uhlolwe ikomiti lamaqembu onke, ngaphambi kokuba ufundwe okwesibili, ngemva komhlangano wangoLwesibili wemizuzu engu-25 nomhloli weNDP uJack Layton kuyi-PMO.

translation.en: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.
translation.zu: U-Layton ucele kube nezinguquko endleleni yokukhipha irisidi yesikweletu phakathi nomhlangano nama-PM, ecela kube “nokubhalwa kabusha okuphelele” kwendlela yokukhipha irisidi yesikweletu.

translation.en: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
translation.zu: Kusukela ngesikhathi Uhulumeni Wenhlangano Yamazwe ungenela ekuphatheni uxhaso lwesibhedlela i-Mersey eDevonport, eThasmaniya, uhulumeni wezwe kanye namanye amalungu kahulumeni wenhlangano yamazwe asola lesi senzo njengesandulela sokhetho lukahulumeni oluzokwenziwa ngoNovemba.

translation.en: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
translation.zu: Kodwa uNdunankulu uJohn Howard uthe umthetho kwakungowokulondoloza izakhiwo zesibhedlela ukuba zingabekwa ezingeni eliphansi uhulumani waseTasmania, ngokunikeza izigidi engu-AUD$45.

translation.en: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
translation.zu: Ngokwencwajana yezindaba yakamuva, amazinga omthamo olwandle aveze ukuthi i-tsunami yenzekile. Bekune-tsunami ebekhona erekhodwe eduze nePago Pago kanye neNiue.

translation.en: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.
translation.zu: Awukho umonakalo omkhulu noma ukulimala okubikiwe eTonga, kodwa ugesi ubungekho okwesikhashana, lokho okubikwa ukuthi kuvimebele iziphathimandla zaseTonga ekutholeni isexwayiso setsunami esikhishwe iPTWC.

translation.en: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.
translation.zu: Izikole eziyishumi nanye eHawaii ezisendaweni noma eziseduze nogu bezivaliwe ngoLwesithathu wonke nangaphezu kokususwa kwesixwayiso.

translation.en: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
translation.zu: Umongameli waseMelika uGeorge W Bush wasamukela isimemezelo.

translation.en: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
translation.zu: Umkhulumeli kaBush uGordon Johndroe ubize isithembiso seNyakatho Korea "ngesinyathelo esiyinhloko emgomweni wokususwa kwezikhali zenuzi okungafakazelwa enhlonhlweni yaseKorea."

translation.en: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.
translation.zu: Isiphepho seshumi esinikwe igama senkathi yeziPhepho zase-Atlantic, iSiphepho Sendawo Efudumele uJerry, saqala oLwandlekazini i-Atlantic namuhla.

translation.en: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.
translation.zu: INational Hurricane Center (NHC) ithi kulenkathi iJerry ingaba nosongo ezweni.

translation.en: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.
translation.zu: Ibutho laseMelika loNjiniyela lilinganise ukuthi ukuna kwemvula kwamayintshi angu-6 angafohla uhide lwezindundumela ezimoshekile esikhathini esidlule.

translation.en: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.
translation.zu: Iwodi Lesishiyagalolunye, elabonakala likhukhuleka ngamagxathu angu-20 phakathi Nesiphepho u-Katrina, okwamanje linamanzi asokhalweni njengoba amanzi elweqe ngaphezulu udonga lokuvimba amanzi oluseduze.

translation.en: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.
translation.zu: Amanzi ayachitheka ngaphezu kohide lwezindundumela engxenyeni engamafidi angu-100 ububanzi.

translation.en: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
translation.zu: Umqondisi weCommons u-Adam Cuerden uzwakalise ukukhungatheka kwakhe ngokusulwa ngemva kokukhuluma ne-Wikinews ngenyanga edlule.

translation.en: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."
translation.zu: "Yena [uWales] ngokuyisisekelo ukhulume amanga kusuka ekuqaleni. Okokuqala, ngokushaya sengathi lokhu bekungenxa yezizathu ezingokomthetho. Okwesibili, ngokuzishaya sengathi wayesilalele, kuze kube sekususweni kobuciko bakhe."

translation.en: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.
translation.zu: Ukudineka komphakathi kwaholela emzamweni wamanje wokubhala umthetho ophathelene nezindaba zobulli ezingosini ezihlinzeka izinkulungwane ngezindaba ezigunyaziwe ezisemthethweni.

translation.en: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
translation.zu: Umsebenzi owenziwe bekungowomcabango kakhulu, kodwa uhlelo lubhalelwe ukulingisa okubonwe emthaleni weSagittarius.

translation.en: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.
translation.zu: Umphumela iqembu ebeliwulindele ubuzobangelwa amandla adonsayo phakathi kwesigaxa esimnyama somthala nesigaxa esimnyama somthala i-Milky way.

translation.en: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
translation.zu: Njengoba inyanga idonsa umhlaba, ubangele ukuphakama kwamanzi olwandle, kanjalo neMilky Way idonsa umthala weSagittarius.

translation.en: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.
translation.zu: Ososayensi bakwazile ukuphetha ngokuthi izigaxa ezimnyama zithinta ezinye izigaxa ezimnyama ngendlela izigaxa ezijwayelekile ezenza ngayo.

translation.en: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
translation.zu: Isichasiselo sithi okumnyama okuzungeze umthala kuzungeze umthala njengendingilizi yokukhanya yohlobo oluthile, futhi kwenziwe ngezinto ezincane eziningi.

translation.en: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.
translation.zu: Imibiko yethelevishini ibonisa intuthu emhlophe iphuma esitshalweni.

translation.en: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.
translation.zu: Iziphathimandla zasendaweni zixwayisa abahlali abaseduze nendawo yemboni ukuba bahlale ezindlini, bacime izipholisa-moya futhi bangaphuzi amanzi ompompi.

translation.en: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.
translation.zu: Ngokwenkampani yenuzi yaseJapani, imisebe yenuzi ye-caesium ne-iodine itholakale endaweni yokusebenzela.

translation.en: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.
translation.zu: Iziphathimandla zicabangela ukuthi lokhu kubonisa ukuthi iziqukathi ebeziqukethe amafutha e-uranium endaweni yokusebenzela kungenzeka ukuthi ziqhumile futhi ziyavuza.

translation.en: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.
translation.zu: UDkt. Tony Moll wathola Ixhwala Elimelene Nemithi Kakhulu (iXDR-TB) esindeni esiseNingizimu Afrika KwaZulu-Natal.

translation.en: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."
translation.zu: Uma kuxoxwa naye, uthe uhlobo olusha “luyakhathaza kakhulu futhi luyashaqisa ngenxa yezinga eliphezulu lokubulala.”

translation.en: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
translation.zu: Ezinye iziguli zithole igciwane esibhedlela, kucabanga uDkt. Moll, futhi okungenani ababili bekuyizisebenzi zempilo zasesibhedlela.

translation.en: In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts.
translation.zu: Ngesikhathi sonyaka owodwa, umuntu othelelekile angathelela abantu asondelene nabo abangu-10 kuya ku-15.

translation.en: However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa.
translation.zu: Nokho, isibalo se XDR-TB eningini labantu abaphila nesifo sofuba kubukeka siphansi; u-6,000 wabantu abangu-330,000 abathintekayo nganoma yisiphi isikhathi eNingizimu Afrika.

translation.en: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth.
translation.zu: Iziphuphutheki, zombili ezazinesisindo esingamaphawundi angu-1,000, futhi zihamba cishe ngamamayela angu-17,500 ngehora, zishayisene amamayela angu-491 ngaphezu koMhlaba.

translation.en: Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive.
translation.zu: Ososayensi bathi ukuqhuma okudalwe ukushayisana kwakukukhulu.

translation.en: They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected.
translation.zu: Basazama ukuthola ukuthi kube kukhulu kangakanani ukugqubuzana nokuthi uMhlaba uzothinteka kanjani.

translation.en: The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris.
translation.zu: Ubuphathi Bamacebo baseMelika behhovisi loMnyango waseMelika Wokuzivikela bulandelela isiwidi.

translation.en: The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.
translation.zu: Imiphumela yokuhlaziya udaba izobhalwa kuyiwebhusayithi.

translation.en: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say.
translation.zu: Udokotela owayesebenza eSibhedlela seziNgane sasePittsburgh, ePennsylvania uzobekwa icala lokubulala okuyisihluku ngemva kokuba unina etholakale eshonile endaweni yokubeka izimpahla ngemuva kwemoto yakhe ngoLwesithathu, kusho iziphathimandla e-Ohio.

translation.en: Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state.
translation.zu: UDkt. Malar Balasubramanian, oneminyaka engu-29, watholwa eMlotha Oluhlaza, e-Ohio, idolobha elicishe libe amamayela angu-15 enyakatho neSinsinathi elele phansi eceleni komgwaqo ngesikibha kanye nezingubo zangaphansi ebonakala sengathi unikwe imithi eminingi yezinhlungu.

translation.en: She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away.
translation.zu: Uqondise izikhulu kuyi-Oldsmobile Intrigue yakhe eyayikude ngamafidi angu- 500.

translation.en: There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets.
translation.zu: Lapho, bathola umzimba kaSaroja Balasubramanian, oneminyaka engu-53, wembozwe ngezingubo zokulala ezinindwe yigazi.

translation.en: Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.
translation.zu: Amaphoyisa athe umzimba ububonakala sengathi ubulapho izinsuku eziningi.

translation.en: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July.
translation.zu: Ukuba khona kwesifo kulenkathi kwaqala ukubikwa ekupheleni kukaJulayi.

translation.en: The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos.
translation.zu: Lesi sifo sitholakala ezingulubeni, esidlulela ebantwini ngominyane.

translation.en: The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides.
translation.zu: Lolu bhubhane lushukumise uhulumeni waseNdiya ukuba athathe izinyathelo ezinjengokuthumela ababamba izingulube ezindaweni ezithinteke kakhulu, ukusakaza izigidi zamakhethini womiyane kanye nokufutha imithi ebulala izinambuzane.

translation.en: Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year.
translation.zu: Izigidi ezimbalwa zamabhodlela womjovo wesifo sobuchopho zithenjiswe uhulumeni, azosiza ukulungiselela izinhlangano zezempilo unyaka ozayo.

translation.en: Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.
translation.zu: Izinhlelo zemijovo okumelwe ithunyelwe ezindaweni ezithinteke kakhulu ngokomlando kulonyaka zilibazisiwe ngenxa yokungabi nemali nokungathathwa njengokubalulekile uma kuqhathaniswa nezinye izifo.

translation.en: In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver.
translation.zu: Ngo 1956 u-Słania wathuthela e-Sweden, lapho iminyaka emithathu kamuva waqala ukusebenzela iHhovisi lePosi lase-Sweden futhi waba umqophi wabo omkhulu.

translation.en: He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries.
translation.zu: Wenzele iSweden izitembu ezingaphezu kuka-1,000 kanye nezingu-28 zamanye amazwe.

translation.en: His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few "household names" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone.
translation.zu: Umsebenzi wakhe ungowekhwalithi eyaziwayo nemininingwane kangangokuthi ungelinye “lamagama aziwayo” phakathi kwabafundi bezitembu. Abanye bangochwepheshe bokuqoqa umsebenzi wakhe wodwa.

translation.en: His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records.
translation.zu: Isitembu sakhe sama-1,000 “bekuyiZenzo eZinkulu zamaKhosi waseSweden” ezibabazekayo ezenzwe nguDavid Klöcker Ehrenstrahl ngo-2000, esibhalwe ku-Guinness Book of World Record.

translation.en: He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills.
translation.zu: Wayehilelekile nasekudwebeni imali eyiphepha yamazwe amaningi, izibonelo zakamuva zomsebenzi wakhe zihlanganisa imifanekiso yoNdunankulu phambi kwemali yephepha yaseCanada engu-$5 kanye no-$100.

translation.en: After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards.
translation.zu: Ngemva kokuba kwenzeke ingozi, uGibson wayiswa esibhedlela kodwa washona ngokushesha ngemva kwalokho.

translation.en: The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash.
translation.zu: Umshayeli weloli, oneminyaka engu-64, akalimalanga ekunqubuzaneni.

translation.en: The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day.
translation.zu: Imoto ngokwayo yasuswa endaweni ingozi eyenzeke kuyo cishe ngo-1200 GMT ngosuku olufanayo.

translation.en: A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."
translation.zu: Umuntu osebenza egalaji eduze nalapho okwenzeke khona inhlekelele uthe: "Bekunezingane ezilinde ukuwela umgwaqo futhi zonke bezimemeza futhi zikhala."

translation.en: They all ran back from where the accident had happened.
translation.zu: Bonke bagijima babuyela lapho ingozi yenzeke khona.

translation.en: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways.
translation.zu: Ezinye izindaba okuzoxoxwa ngazo emhlanganweni eBali zihlanganisa ukuvikela amahlathi womhlaba asele, nokwabelana ngezobuchwepheshe ukusiza amazwe athuthukayo ukuba akhule ngezindlela ezingangcolisi kakhulu.

translation.en: The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts.
translation.zu: Inhlangano Yezizwe Ezihlangene ifuna ukuqedela isikhwama sokusiza amazwe athintwe ukufudumala kwembulunga yonke ukuba abhekane namathonya.

translation.en: The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.
translation.zu: Imali ingasetshenziselwa izidlu ezingakhukhuleki, indlela yokuphatha amanzi engcono, kanye nezinhlobonhlobo zezitshalo.

translation.en: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful.
translation.zu: UFluke ubhale ukuthi imizamo yabanye yokuvimba abesifazane ukuthi bakhulume ngempilo yabesifazane ayiphumelelanga.

translation.en: She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.
translation.zu: Ufike kulesi siphetho ngenxa yokuphawula okuhle okuningi kanye nesikhuthazo athunyelwe sona kokubili abantu ngabanye besifazane kanye nabesilisa becela ukuthi imithi yokuvimbela inzalo ibhekwe njengesidingo sezokwelapha.

translation.en: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells.
translation.zu: Lapho impi inqamukangemva kokuba abalimele bathunyelwe esibhedlele, iziboshwa ezicishe zibe ngu-40 ezisele zihlale egcekeni futhi zenqaba ukubuyela ezitokisini zazo.

translation.en: Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear.
translation.zu: Abaxoxisanyao bazama ukulungisa isimo, kodwa izikhalazo zeziboshwa azicacile.

translation.en: Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard.
translation.zu: Phakathi kuka-10:00-11:00 pm MDT, umlilo waqalwa iziboshwa egcekeni.

translation.en: Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas.
translation.zu: Ngokushesha, izikhulu ezihlome ngempahla yokuzivikela kwababhikishayo zangena egcekeni zavimbezela iziboshwa ngesisi esikhipha unyembezi.

translation.en: Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
translation.zu: Izisebenzi ezingabacishi bomlilo zacima umlilo ngo-11:35 ebusuku.

translation.en: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted.
translation.zu: Ngemva kokuba kwakhiwe idamu ngo-1963, izikhukhula zenkathi ethile yonyaka ezazisabalalisa inzika emfuleni wonke zamiswa.

translation.en: This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats.
translation.zu: Lenzika beyidingeka ekwenzeni izindunduma zesihlabathi nezingu, ezisebenza njengendawo yokuhlala yezilwane zasendle.

translation.en: As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub.
translation.zu: Ngenxa yalokho, izinhlobo ezimbili zezinhlanzi zaqothulwa, futhi ezinye ezimbili zibe sengozini, kuhlanganise ne-humpback chub.

translation.en: Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.
translation.zu: Nakuba izinga lamanzi lizokhuphuka kuphela amafidi ambalwa ngemva kwesikhukhula, iziphathimandla zithemba ukuthi lizokwanela ukuvuselela izindunduma zesihlabathi ezigugulekile ezansi nomfula.

translation.en: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement.
translation.zu: Akukho isixwayiso sesiphepho esikhishiwe, futhi ngokusho kwesikhungo sezemvelo i-Jakarta, asikho isixwayiso sesiphepho esizokhishwa ngoba lokhu kuzamazama komhlaba akufinyelelanga ubukhulu buka-6.5.

translation.en: Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.
translation.zu: Yize kwakungekho ukusabisa kwe-tsunami, kodwa abahlali baqala baba nokwethuka base beqala beshiya amakhaya abo nama bhizinisi abo.

translation.en: Although Winfrey was tearful in her farewell, she made it clear to her fans she will be back.
translation.zu: Yize u-Winfrey wayekhala ngokuvaleliswa kwakhe, wakubeka kwacaca kubalandeli bakhe ukuthi uzobuya.

translation.en: "This is not going to be goodbye. This is the closing of one chapter and the opening of a new one."
translation.zu: “Lokhu angeke kube okokugcina. Lokhu kuwukuvala isihloko esisodwa bese uvula esinye esisha.”

translation.en: Final results from Namibian presidential and parliamentary elections have indicated that the incumbent president, Hifikepunye Pohamba, has been reelected by a large margin.
translation.zu: Imiphumela yokugcina yokhetho lukamongameli kanye nephalamende lase-Namibia ibonisa ukuthi umongameli obesesihlalweni, u-Hifikepunye Pohamba, ukhishwe ngendlela ephawulekayo.

translation.en: The ruling party, South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), also retained a majority in the parliamentary elections.
translation.zu: Iqembu elibusayo i-South West Africa People's Organisation(SWAPO) liphinde lavotelwa ngabaningi okhethweni lwasephalamende.

translation.en: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist.
translation.zu: Amabutho ahlangene nawase-Afghanistan aya endaweni ukuyithatha futhi ezinye izindiza zamabutho ahlangene zithunyelwe kuba ziyosiza.

translation.en: The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire.
translation.zu: Ukuphahlazeka kwenzeke phezulu endaweni enezintaba, futhi kukholelwa ukuthi kubekhona ngenxa yomlilo onamandla.

translation.en: Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.
translation.zu: Imizamo yokufuna indawo yokuphahlazeka iphazanyiswa isimo sezulu esibi kanye nendawo embi.

translation.en: The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country.
translation.zu: Izinhlangano ezisiza abaswele zezokwelapha iMangola, iMedecines Sans Frontieres kanye neWorld Health Organisation zithi ukuqubuka okubi kunakho konke okurekhodiwe ezweni.

translation.en: Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: "Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola," he said.
translation.zu: Umkhulumeli we-Medecines Sans Frontiere u-Richard Veerman uthe: “I-Angola izobhekana nobhubhane olukhulu futhi isimo siqhubeka sisibi e-Angola,” washo.

translation.en: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby.
translation.zu: Imidlalo iqale ngo-10:00 ekuseni ngesimo sezulu esihle futhi ngaphandle komkhemezelo waphakathi nasekuseni onyamalale ngokushesha, kwakuwusuku oluhle lomdlalo weragbhi edlalwa abantu abangu-7 uhlangothi ngalunye.

translation.en: Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia.
translation.zu: INingizimu Afrika esesikhundleni esiphezulu emqhudelwaneni iqale kahle lapho iwina ngo-26 -00 kalula lapho idlala neZambia esesikhundleni sesihlanu.

translation.en: Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed.
translation.zu: Ibukeka sengathi iyawukhohlwa umdlalo ngokumelene nodadewabo abangaseningizimu, iNingizimu Afrika nokho yaya ngokuya ithuthuka njengoba umncintiswano uqhubeka.

translation.en: Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.
translation.zu: Isivikelo sabo esihlelekile, amakhono wokuphatha ibhola nokusebenzisana njengeqembu okuhle kwabenza bavelela futhi kwakucacile ukuthi bayiqembu elihamba phambili.

translation.en: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over.
translation.zu: Iziphathimandla zedolobha lase-Amsterdam kanye neMnyuziyamu ka-Anne Frank zithi umuthi unesikhunta esiyingozi emphakathini njengoba zithi bowusengozini yokuwa ngokushesha.

translation.en: It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.
translation.zu: Beyihlelelwa ukunqunywa ngoLwesibili, kodwa yasindiswa ngemva kwesinqumo senkantolo sezimo eziphuthumayo.

translation.en: All of the cave entrances, which were named "The Seven Sisters", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter.
translation.zu: Zonke izindawo zokungena emhumeni, ezazibizwa ngokuthi "Odadewabo abayiSikhombisa", zingububanzi ngokungenani obungamamitha angu-100 kuya kwangu-250 (amafidi angu-328 kuya kwangu-820).

translation.en: Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves.
translation.zu: Izithombe eziveza ukushisa zibonisa ukuthi ukuhlukahlukana kokushisa kwasebusuku nasemini kubonisa ukuthi zifana nomgede.

translation.en: "They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night.
translation.zu: "Ipholile kunezindawo ezizizungezile emini futhi ifudumale ebusuku.

translation.en: Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground," said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona.
translation.zu: Ukuziphatha kwayo kokushisa akuzinzanga njengemigede emikhulu eMhlabeni leyo egcina izinga lokushisa cishe elifanayo kaningi, kodwa iyafana nalena ngokuba imigodi ejulile enhlabathini," kwasho uGlen Cushing we-United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team kanye neNorthern Arizona University eseFlagstaff, e-Arizona.

translation.en: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope.
translation.zu: E-France, ukuvota kwakuyisiko lobuchwepheshe obuphansi: abavoti bazihlukanisa bodwa ebhokisini, babeka iphepha eliphrintiwe ekuqaleni elibonisa ukhetho lwabo ngaphakathi kwemvilophi.

translation.en: After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll.
translation.zu: Ngemva kokuba iziphathimandla ziqinisekise ubuqu bomuntu ovotayo, abavotayo balahlela izimvilophu ebhokisini lamaphepha okuvota futhi basayine uhlu lwabavotayo.

translation.en: French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings.
translation.zu: Umthetho wokhetho waseFulansi ubeka izimiso eziqinile zenqubo.

translation.en: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
translation.zu: Kusukela ngo-1988, amabhokisi amaphepha okuvota kumelwe kube abonisayo ukuze abavoti kanye nezibukeli bafakazele ukuthi azikho izimvilophu ezikhona lapho kuqala ukuvota nokuthi azikho izimvilophu ezifakwayo ngaphandle kwalezo zabavoti ababalwe ngokufanelekile nabagunyaziwe.

translation.en: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
translation.zu: Amakhandidethi angathumela abameli ukuze babone zonke izingxenye zenqubo. Kusihlwa, amavoti abalwa amavolontiya abekwe iso elibukhali, alandela izinqubo ezithile.

translation.en: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month.
translation.zu: I-ASUS Eee PC, ngaphambili iqalise ukusebenza emhlabeni jikelele ngenxa yezizathu zokonga izindleko nezokusebenza, okwaba wundabamlonyeni ngonyaka ka-2007 ngenyanga yeTaipei IT.

translation.en: But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
translation.zu: Kepha abathengi bekhompyutha ye-laptop bazohluka kakhulu futhi baguquke ngemva kokuba i-ASUS iklomeliswe Eklomelweni Wokulondoloza wase-Taiwan ngo-2007 ilungu lesiGungu uYuan waseRiphabhulikini yaseShayina.

translation.en: The station's web site describes the show as "old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"
translation.zu: Iwebhusayithi yesiteshi ichaza uhlelo "njengomdlalo womsakazo odla ngoludala onokwaziswa okusha kwezobuchwepheshe!"

translation.en: In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio.
translation.zu: Ngesikhathi lusaqala, lolu hlelo lwalufaka lodwa isikhathi eside emsakazweni we-inthanethi i-TogiNet, lengosi yayigxile emisakazweni ekhulumayo.

translation.en: In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station.
translation.zu: Ekupheleni kuka-2015, iTogiNet yamisa i-AstroNet Radio njengesiteshi esiwumsizi.

translation.en: The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas.
translation.zu: Umbukiso ekuqaleni ububonisa abalingisi bezwi abangama-amateur, basendaweni empumalanga yeTexas.

translation.en: Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets.
translation.zu: Ukugqekeza okugcwele konke kubikwa ukuthi kwaqhubeka ubusuku bonke, njengoba amaphoyisa ayengekho emigwaqweni yaseBishkek.

translation.en: Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods.
translation.zu: IBishkek beyichazwa njengecwila esimweni seziyaluyalu” ngomunye wababukeli, njengoba amaqembu wabantu ayezulazula emigwaqweni futhi bephanga izitolo zezimpahla zabathengi. "

translation.en: Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness.
translation.zu: Abahlali abaningana baseBishkek bathwese ababhikishi abasuka eningizimu icala lokwephulwa komthetho.

translation.en: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa.
translation.zu: INingizimu Afrika ihlule ama-All Blacks (iNyuzilandi) emdlalweni we-ragbhi wenyunyoni we-Tri Nations eRoyal Bafokeng Stadium, eRustenburg, eNingizimu Afrika.

translation.en: The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak.
translation.zu: Imiphumela yokugcina bekuwukuphumelela kwephuzu elilodwa, u-21 ku-20, okwaqeda ukuwina njalo kwama-All Blacks kwemidlalo engu-15.

translation.en: For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak.
translation.zu: KumaBhokobhoko, lokhu kunqamule ukungaphumeleli emidlalweni emihlanu elandelanayo.

translation.en: It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago.
translation.zu: Bekuwumdlalo wokugcina wama-All Blacks, asephumelele kakade indebe emavikini ambalwa adlule.

translation.en: The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.
translation.zu: Umdlalo wokugcina womqhudelwano uzokwenzeka e-Ellis Park eGoli ngeviki elizayo, lapho ama-Springbok edlala ne-Australia.

translation.en: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday.
translation.zu: Ukuzamazama komhlaba okuncane kwanyakazisa intshonalanga ye-Montana ngo-10: 08 p.m. ngoMsombuluko.

translation.en: No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center.
translation.zu: Ayikho imibiko yakamuva yomonakalo eyamukelwe Ukuhlola kwaseMelika kweJiyoloji (USGS) kanye neSikhungo Sokwaziswa Sokuzamazama Komhlaba Sezwe.

translation.en: The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
translation.zu: Ukuzamazama komhlaba kwakugxile endaweni cishe engama-20 km (amamayela angu-15) enyakatho esempumalanga esenyakatho yeDillon, futhi cishe nama-65 km (amamayela angu-40) eningizimu neButte.

translation.en: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France.
translation.zu: Uhlobo lomkhuhlane wezinyoni olubulalayo ebantwini, i-H5N1, kuqinisekisiwe ukuthi luhlasele idada lasendle, elatholakala ngoMsombuluko, endaweni yamaxhaphozi eduze naseLyon empumalanga neFulansi.

translation.en: France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy.
translation.zu: IFulansi yizwe lesikhombisa esiGungwini saseYurophu lokuthola leligciwane; ngemva kwe-Austria, iJalimane, iSlovenia, iBulgria, iGrisi kanye neNtaliyane.

translation.en: Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
translation.zu: Ubantu okusolakala ukuthi baphethwe i-H5N1 eCroatia naseDenmark abakaqinisekiswa.

translation.en: Chambers had sued God for "widespread death, destruction and terrorization of millions upon millions of the Earth's inhabitants."
translation.zu: Izindlu zezinkantolo zimangalele uNkulunkulu “ngokwanda kakhulu kokufa, izinhlekelele kanye nokuphekulwa kwezigidi zezigidi zabahlali boMhlaba.”

translation.en: Chambers, an agnostic, argues that his lawsuit is "frivolous" and "anybody can sue anybody."
translation.zu: UChambers, ongakholelwa kunkulunkulu, uphikisa ngokuthi ukumangalelwa kwakhe "akunanjongo" futhi "noma ubani angahlawulisa noma ubani."

translation.en: The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist "whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."
translation.zu: Indaba evezwe kuyi-opera yaseFulansi, ngu-Camille Saint-Saens, iciko “elikuphila kwalo kwathathwa uthando lwezidakamizwa kanye ne-Japani.”

translation.en: As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in.
translation.zu: Njengomphumela, abaculi babhema insangu ye-cannabis esiteji, futhi nethiyetha ngokwayo igqugquzela izilaleli ukuba zihlanganyele.

translation.en: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively.
translation.zu: Umkhulumeli Wendlu uNewt Gingrich, umbusi waseTexas uRick Perry, kanye nelungu lesishaya-mthetho lowesifazane uMichele Bachmann baqede endaweni yesine, yesihlanu, kanye neyesithupha, ngokulandelana.

translation.en: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.
translation.zu: Ngemva kokuba kufike imiphumela, uGingrich ubabaze uSantorum, kodwa wayenamazwi anzima kuRomney, lowo owenzelwa umkhankaso wezikhangiso ezimbi e-Iowa ngokumelene noGingrich.

translation.en: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.
translation.zu: U-Perry wathi waye"zobuyela e-Texas ukuyohlola imiphumela yekhokhasi yanamuhla ebusuku, nginqume ukuthi ingabe ikhona yini indlela ephambili yami kulo mjaho", kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wathi uzohlala emncintiswaneni futhi ancintisane ngoMasingana 21 e-South Carolina primary.

translation.en: Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
translation.zu: UBachmann, owawina Ukuvota kwe-Ames Straw ngo-Agasti, wanquma ukuqeda umkhankaso.

translation.en: The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died.
translation.zu: Umthwebuli wezithombe wayiswa esiKhungweni sezoKwelapha sikaRonald Reagan UCLA, lapho eshone khona ngokushesha.

translation.en: He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said "[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."
translation.zu: Kuthiwa wayeseminyakeni yawo-20. Esitatimendeni, uBieber uthe "nakuba ngangingekho futhi ngingahilelekile ngokuqondile kulengozi ebuhlungu, imicabango kanye nemikhuleko yami inomndeni wesisulu."

translation.en: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
translation.zu: Iwebhusayithi yezindaba zokuzijabulisa i-TMZ iqonda ukuthi umthathi wezithombe wamisa imoto yakhe kolunye uhlangothi lweSepulveda Boulevard futhi wazama ukuthatha izithombe zamaphoyisa ayevimbezele ngaphambi kokuwela umgwaqo futhi aqhubeke, okwashukumisa iphoyisa leCalifornia Highway Patrol elalivimebezele izimoto ukuba limyalele ukuthi a welele emuva, kabili.

translation.en: According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges.
translation.zu: Ngokusho kwamaphoyisa, cishe akunakwenzeka ukuthi umshayeli wemoto eshayise umthathi wezithombe amangalelwe.

translation.en: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium.
translation.zu: Ngamamedali ayishumi nesishiyagalimbili kuphela atholakalayo ngosuku, amazwe amaningi ahlulekile ukuthola izindondo zamamedali.

translation.en: They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event.
translation.zu: Bahlanganisa iNetherlands, ngo-Anna Jochemsen oqede endaweni yesishiyagalolunye esigabeni sabesifazane abamile kuyiSuper-G izolo, neFinland ngoKatja Saarinen oqede endaweni yeshumi emdlalweni ofanayo.

translation.en: Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G.
translation.zu: U-Mitchell Gourley wase-Australia uqede esikhundleni seshumi nanye esigabeni sabesilise sabamile se-Super-G. Imbangi yaseCzech u-Oldrich Jelinek uqede esikhundleni seshumi nesithupha esigabeni sabesilisa sabahlezi se-Super-G.

translation.en: Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G.
translation.zu: U-Arly Velasquez waseMexico uqede endaweni yesishumi nanhlanu kuyiSuper-G yabesilisa abahlezi. UAdam Hall waseNyuzilandi uqede endaweni yesishiyagalolunye kuyiSuper G yabesilisa abamile.

translation.en: Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
translation.zu: Umshushuluzi waseqhweni wase-Poland wesigaba sabesilisa abangaboni kahle u-Maciej Krezel nomqondisi u-Anna Ogarzynska uqede endaweni yeshumi nantathu kuyi-Super-G. UJong Seork Park waseNingizimu Korea uqede endaweni yamashumi amabili nesine esigabeni sabesilisa abahlezi se-Super-G.

translation.en: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment.
translation.zu: Abagcini bokuthula be-UN, abafike eHaiti ngemva kokuzamazama komhlaba kwango-2010, babekwa icala ngokusabalala kwesifo esiqale eduze nakumu lamasosha.

translation.en: According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest.
translation.zu: Ngokwecala, ukungcola okuvela ekamu le-UN akukhucululwanga kahle, okwabangela ukuthi amabhakithiliya angene emingeneleni yoMfula i-Artibonite, omunye wemifula emikhulu yaseHaiti.

translation.en: Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s.
translation.zu: Ngaphambi kokufika kwamabutho, iHaiti beyingakahlangabezani nezinkinga ezihlobene nesifo kusukela ngawo-1800.

translation.en: The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti.
translation.zu: Inhlangano yaseHaiti yoKulunga Nombuso Wentando Yeningi icaphune ucwaningo oluzimele olusikisela ukuthi iqembu lamabutho ayinkulungwane le-UN laseNephali lokugcina ukuthula lilethe isifo eHaiti lingazi.

translation.en: Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.
translation.zu: UDanielle Lantagne, isazi se-UN sesifo, uthe kunamathuba okuthi ukuqubuka kwesifo kubangelwe abagcini bokuthula.

translation.en: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition.
translation.zu: UHamilton uqinisekise ukuthi Isibhedlela saseNyuvesi yaseHoward samukele isiguli sisesimweni esizinzile.

translation.en: The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred.
translation.zu: Isiguli sase-Nirgeria, lapho kubikwe ukuba khona kwegciwane le-Ebola.

translation.en: The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.
translation.zu: Izibhedlela zilandele imithetho yokulawula ukutheleleka, okuhlanganisa ukuhlukanisa iziguli kwezinye ukuze kugwenywe ukutheleleka.

translation.en: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions.
translation.zu: Ngaphambi kweThe Simpsons uSimon wayesebenze ezinhlelweni eziningana ezikhundleni ezihlukahlukene.

translation.en: During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show.
translation.zu: Ngeminyaka yama-1980 wasebenza emibukisweni efana neTaxi, i-Cheers, noMboniso we-Tracy Ullman.

translation.en: In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team.
translation.zu: Ngo-1989 wasiza ukwakha i-The Simpsons no-Brooks kanye no-Groening, futhi wayenomthwalo wemfanelo wokuqasha iqembu lohlelo lokubhala lokuqala.

translation.en: Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.
translation.zu: Ngaphezu kokuyeka uhlelo ngo-1993 ugcine isiqu somdidiyeli wohlelo, futhi waqhubeka nokuthola amashumi wezigidi zamadola isizini ngayinye wemivuzo.

translation.en: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked.
translation.zu: Ngaphambili, inhlangano yezindaba yaseShayina i-Xinhua yabika ukuthi kunendiza ethunjiwe.

translation.en: Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar.
translation.zu: Imibiko yakamuva yabe isithi indiza ithola ukusongelwa ngebhomu futhi yaphambukiselwa emuva e-Afghanistan, ima e-Kandahar.

translation.en: The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.
translation.zu: Imibiko yasekuqaleni ithi indiza iphambukiselwe emuva e-Afghanistan ngemva kokwenqatshelwa indawo yokuma yezimo eziphuthumayo e-Ürümqi.

translation.en: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations.
translation.zu: Izingozi zasemoyeni zivamile e-Iran, enezindiza eziningi ezigugile ezingalondolozwa kahle ezisetshenziselwa kokubili izakhamizi ezivamile kanye nempi.

translation.en: International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased.
translation.zu: Ukujeziswa kwamanye amazwe kusho ukuthi indiza entsha ayinakuthengwa.

translation.en: Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more.
translation.zu: Ekuqaleni kwaleli viki, ukuphahlazeka kwendiza yamaphoyisa enophephela emhlane kubulale abantu abathathu futhi kwalimaza abanye abathathu.

translation.en: Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board.
translation.zu: Ngenyanga edlule i-Iran yavelelwa inhlekelele enkulu yezindiza ngemva kweminyaka lapho indiza eyayiphokophele e-Armenia yaphahlazeka khona, yabulala abangu-168 ababekuyo.

translation.en: The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.
translation.zu: Ngenyanga efanayo indiza idlule lapho umgwaqo wezindiza uphelela khona eMashhad futhi yashayisa udonga, ibulala abayishumi nesikhombisa.

translation.en: Aerosmith have cancelled their remaining concerts on their tour.
translation.zu: I-Aerosmith ikhansele amakhonsathi ayo asele ohambweni lwayo.

translation.en: The rock band was due to tour the United States and Canada until September 16.
translation.zu: Iqembu lomculo we-rock bekufanele livakashele eMelika naseKhanada kuze kube nguSeptemba 16.

translation.en: They have cancelled the tour after lead singer Steven Tyler was injured after he fell off stage while performing on August 5.
translation.zu: Bakhansele uhambo ngemva kokuba umculi oyinhloko u-Steven Tyler elimele ngemva kokuwa esiteji ngenkathi ecula ngo-Agasti.

translation.en: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set.
translation.zu: UMurray ulahlekelwe ingxenye yakhe yomdlalo emdlalweni wokubona ukuthi kuwina bani kwabalinganayo ngamaphuzu ngemva kokuthi womabili amadoda ayelingana ezinyeni zawo zomdlalo.

translation.en: Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6.
translation.zu: UDel Potro wayesesimweni esiyinzuzo ekuqaleni engxenyeni yesibili yomdlalo, kodwa lona nawo ubudinga umdlalo wokubona ukuthi kuphumelela bani kwabalinganayo ngemva kokufika ku-6-6.

translation.en: Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.
translation.zu: U-Potro uthole ukwelashwa ehlombe ngaleso sikhathi kodwa wakwazi ukubuyela emdlalweni .

translation.en: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC).
translation.zu: Uhlelo lwaqala ngo-8:30 p.m. ngesikhathi sendawo (15.00 UTC).

translation.en: Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet.
translation.zu: Abaculi abadumile ezweni lonke banikela ngama-bhajan, noma izingoma zokuzinikela, ezinyaweni zikaShri Shyam.

translation.en: Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
translation.zu: Umculi uSanju Sharma bekunguye oqalile kusihlwa, elandelwa uJai Shankar Choudhary. Unikele nge-chhappan bhog bhajan ngokufanayo. Umculi, uRaju Khandelwala wayehamba naye.

translation.en: Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans.
translation.zu: Ngakho, uLakkha Singh uholile ekuculeni i-bhajans.

translation.en: 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam.
translation.zu: Izitsha ezingu-108 zeChhappan Bhog (ngenkolelo yobuHindu, izinto ezidliwayo ezihlukile ezingu-56, njengamaswidi, izithelo, amantongomane, ukudla njll. Okunikelwa esithixweni) zanikezelwa kuBaba Shyam.

translation.en: Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.
translation.zu: U-Lakkha Singh wanikezela ngange-Chhappan bhog bhajan. Umculi, uRaju Khandelwal bekahamba naye.

translation.en: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console.
translation.zu: EsethulwenisangoLwesine esasingumongo se-Tokyo Game Show, umongameli we-Nintendo u-Satoru Iwata wadalula isakhiwo sesilawuli se-Nintendo Revolution sesilawuli esisha senkampani.

translation.en: Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space.
translation.zu: Isilawuli esifana ne-remote yethelevishini, sisebenzisa izinzwa ezimbili ezibekwe duzane nethelevishini ukwenza indawo yayo ibe nezingxenye ezintathu endaweni enezinhlangothi ezintathu.

translation.en: This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
translation.zu: Lokhu kuzovumela abadlali ukuba balawule izenzo nokunyakaza emdlalweni wevidiyo ngokunyakazisa isisetshenziswa emoyeni.

translation.en: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start.
translation.zu: UGiancarlo Fisichella wangakwazi ukuqondisa imoto yakhe futhi waqeda umjaho ngokushesha ngomva kokuba uqale.

translation.en: His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel.
translation.zu: Abeqembu lakhe u-Fernando Alonso bebephuma phambili cishe kuwoo wonke umjaho, kodwa kuphele ngokushesha nje ngemva kokupaka endaweni yokulungisa imoto, kungenzeka kungenxa yesondo langaphambili elifakwe kabi.

translation.en: Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.
translation.zu: UMichael Schumacher waqeda umjaho wakhe kungekudala ngemva kuka-Alonso, ngenxa yokulimala kwesimo esigcina imoto iphakeme emishikashikeni eminingi phakathi nomjaho.

translation.en: "She’s very cute and sings quite well, too," he said according to a transcript of the news conference.
translation.zu: "Muhle kakhulu futhi ucula kahle kakhulu, futhi," washo kuya ngamakhophi okukhulunyiwe wenkomfa yabezindaba.

translation.en: "I was moved every time we did a rehearsal on this, from the bottom of my heart."
translation.zu: "Ngangithinteka ekujuleni kwenhliziyo yami, njalo lapho silungiselela lokhu."

translation.en: Around 3 minutes into the launch, an on-board camera showed numerous pieces of insulation foam break away from the fuel tank.
translation.zu: Cishe emizuzwini emithathu ngaphambi kokuqalisa, ikhamera esemkhumbini yaveza izingcezu eziningi zogwebu olufudumazayo luphuma ethangini lamafutha.

translation.en: However, they are not thought to have caused any damage to the shuttle.
translation.zu: Nokho, akucatshangwa ukuthi zenze noma imuphi umonakalo enqoleni.

translation.en: NASA's shuttle program chief N. Wayne Hale Jr. said the foam had fallen "after the time we are concerned about."
translation.zu: Isikhulu sohlelo lwemikhumbi-mkhathi luka-NASA u-N. Wayne Hale Jr. uthe igwebu lase liwile "ngemuva kwesikhathi esikhathazekile ngazo."

translation.en: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
translation.zu: Imizuzu emihlanu umbukiso uqalile umoya uqala ukungena, cishe ngemva komzuzu, umoya ufinyelela u-70km/h… bese imvula iyeza, kodwa enzima nenkulu kangangokuba ihlaba isikhumba sakho njengenaliti, bese isichotho sawa emkhathini, abantu bayaxhamazela futhi bayamemeza futhi bayagxobana.

translation.en: I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them," Armand Versace said.
translation.zu: Ngilahlekelwe ngudadewethu kanye nomngane wakhe, futhi endleleni ngilibangise lapho bekunabantu ababili abakhubazekile ababehlezi ezihlalweni ezinamasondo, abantu bebeqa ngaphezulu futhi bebasunduza,” kusho u-Armand Versace.

translation.en: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally.
translation.zu: I-NHK ibike nokuthi isifunda sesikhungo samandla wenuzi iKashiwazaki Karawa eNiigata besisebenza ngokuvamile.

translation.en: Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down.
translation.zu: IHokuriku Electric Power Co. ayibikanga ukuthinteka okuvela ekuzamazameni komhlaba nokuthi isiphehli Nombolo 1 no-2 esikhungweni sayo samandla enuzi zivaliwe.

translation.en: It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity.
translation.zu: Kubikwe ukuthi amakhaya angaba ngu-9400 endaweni awanawo amanzi futhi cishe angu-100 awanawo ugesi.

translation.en: Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.
translation.zu: Eminye imigwaqo ibe nomonakalo, izinkonzo zesitimela ziphazamisekile ezindaweni ezithintekile, futhi neSikhumulo Sezindiza saseNoto sasesifundazweni sase-Ishikawa sisavaliwe.

translation.en: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office.
translation.zu: Ibhomu eyodwa iqhume ngaphandle kwehhovisi likandunankulu.

translation.en: Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours.
translation.zu: Amabhomu amanye amathathu aqhumile eduze nezakhiwo zikahulumeni esikhathini samahora amabili.

translation.en: Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.
translation.zu: Eminye imibiko ithi inani labafile elisemthethweni isishiyagalombili, futhi umbiko osemthethweni uqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abangaba ngu-30 balimele; kepha izinombolo zokugcina azikaziwa.

translation.en: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food.
