translation.zu: Kokubili i-cynuric acid kanye ne-melamine zitholakele kumasampula omchamo ovela ezilwaneni ezifuywayo ezishne ngemva kokudla ukudla kwezilwane okungcolile.

translation.en: The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said.
translation.zu: Izakhi ezimbili ziyaxubana ukuze zenze amakristalu angavimba ukusebenza kwezinso, kwasho abacwabingi basenyuvesi.

translation.en: The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid.
translation.zu: Abacwaningi bathole ukuthi amakristalu enzeka emchamweni wekati ngokunezeleka kwe-milamine kanye ne-cyanuric acid.

translation.en: The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
translation.zu: Ukwakheka kwalamakristalu kufana nalokho okutholakale emchamweni wezilwane ezifuywayo ezithintekile uma uqhathaniswa nge-infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

translation.en: I don't know if you realize it or not, but most of the goods from Central America came into this country duty-free.
translation.zu: Angazi ukuthi uyakuphawula noma cha, kodwa iningi lezimpahla ezivela eMelika ePhakathi zeza kulelizwe ngaphandle kokukhokhiswa intela.

translation.en: Yet eighty percent of our goods were taxed through tariffs in Central American countries. we treat you.
translation.zu: Nokho amaphesenti ayisishiyagalombili wempahla yethu akhokhiswe intela ngezihlelo zokutheliswa kwempahla engenayo noma ephumayo ezweni emazweni waseMelika ePhakathi. Siyakuphatha.

translation.en: That didn't seem to make sense to me; it certainly wasn't fair.
translation.zu: Lokho bekungenzi ingqondo kimi; bekungalungile nakanjani.

translation.en: All I say to people is you treat us the way we treat you.
translation.zu: Engikushoyo nje kubantu ngukuthi siphathe ngendlela esikuphatha ngayo.

translation.en: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.
translation.zu: UMbusi waseCalifornia u-Arnorld Schwarzenegger ugunyaze umthetho ovivinywayo ovimbela ukudayisela noma ukuqashisela izingane imidlalo yevidiyo enodleme ukuba ube umthetho.

translation.en: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
translation.zu: Irisidi ebonisa ukudayiswa kwemidlalo yevidiyo embusweni wase-California ephawulwe ngokuthi “18”okwenza umthengisi wayo ahlawuliswe imali engu-$1000 icala ngalinye.

translation.en: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce.
translation.zu: UMqondisi wezoKubekwa Kwamacala koMphakathi, uKier Starmer QC, unikeze isitatimende namuhla ekuseni ememezela ukubekwa kwecala kukaHuhne kanye noPryce bobabili.

translation.en: Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating.
translation.zu: UHuhne ushiye phansi futhi uzothathelwa isikhundla kuyiKhabhinethi ngu- -Ed Davey oyiLungu lePhalamende. U-Norman Lamb oyiLungu lePhalamende kulindelwe ukuthi athathe umsebenzi kaNgqongqoshe weBhizinisi oyekwa uDavey.

translation.en: Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.
translation.zu: UHhne kanye noPryce bahlelelwe ukuvela eNkantolo kaMatshi yaseWestminster ngoFebruwari 16,

translation.en: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver.
translation.zu: Ukufa kukaNicholas Alden, ona-25, kanye noZachary Cuddeback, ona-21. UCuddeback wayengumshayeli.

translation.en: Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face.
translation.zu: U-Edga Veguilla wathola amanxeba wasengalweni nasemhlathini kuyilapho u-Kristoffer Schneider wasala edinga ukuhlizwa kokwakha kabusha ebusweni.

translation.en: Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium.
translation.zu: Isikhali sika-Uka sahluleka lapho wayekhombe indoda yesihlanu ekhanda. U-Schneider wayenobuhlungu obungapheli, ukungaboni esweni elilodwa, ingxenye yogebhezi engekho kanye nobuso obakhiwe kabusha nge-titanium.

translation.en: Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.
translation.zu: U-Schneider wanikeza ubufakazi ngevidiyo kusuka esikhungweni se-USAF ezweni lakubo.

translation.en: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships.
translation.zu: Ngale kwesehlakalo sangolwesithathu, uCarpanedo uncintisane emijahweni emibili ngayinye yobuShampeni.

translation.en: Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race.
translation.zu: Umncintiswano wakhe wokuqala bekuyi-Slalom, lapho Engaqedanga khona umncintiswano wakhe wokuqala. Abancintisanayo abangu-36 kwabangu-116 bathole imiphumela efanayo kulowo mncintiswano.

translation.en: Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary.
translation.zu: Omunye umjaho wakhe, i-Giant Slalom, waqeda engoweshumi eqenjini labesifazane elalihlezi nesikhathi esihlanganisiwe esingu-4:41.30, wayesemuva ngo-2:11.60 kuu-Austrian Claudia Loesch owathatha indawo yokuqala futhi wayesemuva ngo- 1:09.02 k-uGyöngyi Dani wase-Hungary owaqeda ekwindawo yesishiyagalolunye.

translation.en: Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.
translation.zu: Abashushuluza eqhweni abane eqenjini labesifazane abahlezi bahluleke ukuqeda imijaho yabo, futhi abangu-45 kwabangu-117 abashushuluza eqhweni eSlalom eNkulu bahluleke ukuthola izikhundla emjahweni.

translation.en: The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone.
translation.zu: Amaphoyisa waseMadhya Pradesh amukele ikhompyutha ephathwayo kanye nomakhalekhukhwini.

translation.en: Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, "We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop".
translation.zu: Iphini loMphenyi oMkhulu uD K Arya uthe, "Sibophe abantu abahlanu abanukubeze ngokocansi owesifazane waseSwitzerland futhi simbuyisele ucingo lwakhe kanye ne-laptop".

translation.en: The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar.
translation.zu: Abasolwa babizwa ngoBaba Kanjar, uBhutha Kanjar, uRampro Kanjar, uGaza Kanjar kanye noVishnu Kanjar.

translation.en: Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces.
translation.zu: Umphathi wamaphoyisa uChandra Solanki uthe abasolwa bavele enkantolo bazifihle ubuso.

translation.en: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt.
translation.zu: Nakuba bekunabantu abathathu phakathi kwendlu ngenkathi imoto iyishayisa, akekho kubo olimele.

translation.en: However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head.
translation.zu: Noma kunjalo, umshayeli uthole izingozi ezimbi ekhanda.

translation.en: The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT.
translation.zu: Umgwaqo lapho inhlekelele yenzeka khona wavalwa okwesikhashana ngesikhathi izisebenzi zezimo eziphuthumayo zikhulula umshayeli kuyi-Audi TT ebomvu.

translation.en: He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth.
translation.zu: Uqale wangeniswa esibhedlela sase-James Paget e–Yarmouth eNkulu.

translation.en: He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
translation.zu: Ngokulandelayo uye watholakala eSibhedlela i-Addenbrooke e-Cambridge.

translation.en: Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son.
translation.zu: u-Adekoya selokhu eseNkantolo ka-Sheriff yas-Edinburgh etheswe icala lokubulala indodana yakhe.

translation.en: She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published.
translation.zu: Uboshiwe njengoba esalinde ukubekwa nokuthethwa kwecala, kodwa noma ibuphi ubufakazi bofakazi bokuzibonela bungonakaliswa njengoba isithombe sakhe sishicilelwe kabanzi.

translation.en: This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial.
translation.zu: Lena inqubo evamile kwezinye izindawo e-UK kodwa umthetho waseScotland usebenza ngokuhlukile futhi izinkantolo zibone ukushicilelwa kwezithombe njengokungonakalisa.

translation.en: Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes "journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."
translation.zu: UProfesa Pamela Ferguson wase Nyuvesi yase-Dundee uyabhala “izintantheli zizibizela amathonsi abanzi ngokushicilela izithombe nokunye kwabasolwa.”

translation.en: Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment.
translation.zu: I-Crown Office, okuyiyo ephethe uphenyo, itshele izintatheli ukuthi ngeke iphawule okungenani kuze kube ukuthethwa kwecala.

translation.en: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War.
translation.zu: Idokhumenti, kuya ngabasiki bebunda, izokhuluma ngombango wemingcele, leyo iPhalestina efuna isekelwe emingceleni ngaphambi kweMpi yaseMpumalanga eMaphakathi yango-1967.

translation.en: Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue.
translation.zu: Ezinye izihloko ezikhona zihlanganisa ikusasa leJerusalema eligcwele kuzo zombili izizwe kanye nenkinga Yesigodi saseJordani.

translation.en: Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.
translation.zu: I-Israyeli ifuna ukuba amasosha aqhubeke ekhona esigodini iminyaka eyishumi uma nje isivumelwano sisayinilwe nakuba i-PA ivuma ukuba amasosha abe khona iminyaka eyisihlanu kuphela.

translation.en: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated.
translation.zu: Abadubuli esilingweni sokususa izilwane ezihluphayo bekufanele babekwe iso abaphathi bendawo, njengoba isilingo besiqashelwe futhi impumelelo yaso ihlolwa.

translation.en: In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program.
translation.zu: Ngokubambisana neNPWS kanye neSporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, amavolontiya afanelekayo abuthwa, ngaphansi kohlelo lokuzingela lweSporting Shooters Association.

translation.en: According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.
translation.zu: NgokukaMick O’Flynn, Umqondisi Obambele wePaki Lokonga Nefa kanye neNPWS, abadubuli abane abakhethwe ohlelweni lokudubula bathola ukuqeqeshwa okujulile kokuphepha nokuqeqesha.

translation.en: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday.
translation.zu: UMartelly ufungiise i-Provisional Electora Council(CEP) entsha enamalunga ayisishiyagalolunye izolo.

translation.en: It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years.
translation.zu: I-CEP yesihlanu eminyakeni emine ka-Martelly.

translation.en: Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections.
translation.zu: Ngenyanga edlule ikhomishani yobumongameli ituse ukuyeka isikhundla kwe-CEP kwangaphambili njengengxenye yezinyathelo zokwenza izwe ukuba livote.

translation.en: The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October.
translation.zu: Ukwenza bekuwukusabela kukaMartelly ekubhikisheni ngokumelene nohulumeni okusakazekile okuqale ngo-Okthoba.

translation.en: The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.
translation.zu: Ukubhikisha okuba nodlame ngezinye izikhathi kususwe ukuhluleka kokuba nokhetho, olunye okwakufanele lube khona kusukela ngo-2011.

translation.en: Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns.
translation.zu: Izigameko ezicishe zibe ngu-60 zama-iPod angasebenzi kahle zibikiwe, ezidale ingqikithi yemililo eyisithupha nokushiye abantu abane beshe kancane.

translation.en: Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices.
translation.zu: INkonzo yoMnotho yaseJapani, Ezohwebo kanye Nemboni (METI) ithe ibe yazi ngezenzakalo ezingu-27 ezihlobene nezisetshenziswa.

translation.en: Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called "non-serious."
translation.zu: Ngeviki elidlule, iMETI imemezele ukuthi i-Apple iyazise ngezigamego zokushisa ngokweqile ezengeziwe ezingu-34, lezo inkampani ezibize ngokuthi "into engeyona enkulu."

translation.en: The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report "truly regrettable."
translation.zu: Inkonzo yasabela ngokubiza ukuhlehliswa kombiko yi-Apple ngokuthi “kuyadabukisa ngempela.”

translation.en: The eathquake struck Mariana at 07:19 a.m. local time (09:19 p.m. GMT Friday).
translation.zu: Ukuzamazama komhlaba kuhlasele i-Mariana ngo-07:19 ekuseni wesikhathi sakhona (09:19 ntambama ngoLwesihlanu GMT).

translation.en: The Northern Marianas emergency management office said that there were no damages reported in the nation.
translation.zu: Ihhovisi lokulawula izimo eziphuthumayo laseNyakatho Marianas lithe awukho umonakalo obikiwe ezweni.

translation.en: Also the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center said that there was no Tsunami indication.
translation.zu: Futhi i-Pacific Tsunami Warning Agency Center ithe akukho okukhombisa i-Tsunami.

translation.en: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines.
translation.zu: Lowo owayeyiphoyisa lasePhilippines uthumbe izivakashi zaseHong Kong ngokuthumba ibhasi lazo eManila, inhlokodolobha yasePhilippines.

translation.en: Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists.
translation.zu: URolando Mandoza wadubula isibhamu sakhe se-M16 ezivakashini.

translation.en: Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far.
translation.zu: Izithunjwa ezimbalwa zikhululiwe futhi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi okungenani eziyisithupha zishonile kuze kube manje.

translation.en: Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers.
translation.zu: Izithunjwa eziyisithupha, kuhlanganise izingane kanye nabakhulile, zikhululwe masinya, kanjalo nangabathathi bezithombe basePhilippines.

translation.en: The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.
translation.zu: Abathathi bezithombe kamuva bathatha indawo yesalukazi njengoba besidinga indlu yangasese. Umendoza wadutshulwa.

translation.en: Liggins followed in his father’s footsteps and entered a career in medicine.
translation.zu: Uliggins walandela izinyathelo zikayise futhi wasebenza emkhakheni wezokwelapha.

translation.en: He trained as an obstetrician and began to work at the Auckland's National Women's Hospital in 1959.
translation.zu: Ufundele ukuba udokotela wokubelethisa futhi waqala ukusebenza e-Auckland's National Womens's Hospital ngo-1959,

translation.en: While he was working at the hospital Liggins began to investigate premature labor during his spare time.
translation.zu: Ngenkathi esebenza esibhedlela uLiggins waqala ukuphenya imihelo efika singakafiki isikhathi sokubeletha lapho engasebenzi.

translation.en: His research showed that if a hormone was administered it would speed up the baby's foetal lung maturation.
translation.zu: Ucwaningo lwakhe lubonise ukuthi uma ihomoni isetshenziswa izokwenza ukuba ukukhula kwamaphaphu wombungu wengane kusheshe.

translation.en: Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday.
translation.zu: I-Xinhua yabika ukuthi abaphenyi bakahulumeni bathola ama-“black box” amabilii okurekhoda izindiza ngoLwesithathu.

translation.en: Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna.
translation.zu: Umdlali we-wrestling naye washo amazwi okuhlonipha uLuna.

translation.en: Tommy Dreamer said "Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."
translation.zu: UTommy Dreamer wathi “uLuna bekuyiNdlovukazi Yokwedlulele yokuqala. Umphathi wami wokuqala. ULuna washona ngobusuku bezinyanga ezimbili. Kuyingqayizivele njengaye. Owesifazane Onamandla.”

translation.en: Dustin "Goldust" Runnels commented that "Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."
translation.zu: U-Dustin “Thulilwegolide” Runnels waphawula ngokuthi “uLuna wayehlanya njengami...mhlawumbe ukungidlula...ngiyamthanda futhi ngizomkhumbula...ngiyethemba usendaweni engcono.”

translation.en: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008.
translation.zu: Phakathi kwabantu abangu-1,400 abavote ngaphambi kokhetho lukahulumeni 2010, labo ababengavumelani nokuthi i-Australia ibe iriphabhuliki banda ngamaphesenti angu-8 kusukela ngo-2008.

translation.en: Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign.
translation.zu: UNdunankulu Wokunakekela uJulia Gillard wathi phakathi nomkhankaso wokhetho lwango-2010 wayekholelwa ukuthi i-Astralia kumelwe ibe izwe elibuswa ngentando yeningi ngemva kokubusa kweNdlovukazi uElizabeth II.

translation.en: 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch.
translation.zu: Amaphesenti angu-34 walabo abavotayo unalombono, ufuna Indlovukazi u-Elizabeth II ukuba abe umbusi wokugcina wase-Australia.

translation.en: At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
translation.zu: Emananini adlulele wokuvota, amaphesentu angu-29 walabo ababuzwe imibuzo bakholelwa ukuthi i-Australia kumelwe ibe yiriphabhuliki ngokushesha ngangokunokwenzeka, kuyilapho amaphesenti angu-31 akholelwa ukuthi i-Australia akumelwe ibe yiriphabhuliki.

translation.en: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt.
translation.zu: Lowo owathola indondo yegolide kuma-Olimpiki kwakumelwe ahlanganyele emcintiswaneni wokubhukude we-100m kanye ne-200m wokubhukuda nganoma iyiphi indlela futhi kunemidlalo yokunikezelana eMidlalweni yama-Commonwealth, kodwa ngenxa yokukhalaza kwakhe kuyasolwa ukuthi unamandla ngokomzimba.

translation.en: He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.
translation.zu: Akakwazanga ukuthatha imithi edingekayo yokulwisana nobuhlungu bakhe njengoba ingavunyelwe eMidlalweni.

translation.en: Curtis Cooper, a mathematician and computer science professor at the University of Central Missouri, has discovered the largest known prime number to date on January 25.
translation.zu: U-Curtis Cooper, usozibalo nophinde abe nguprofesa wesayensi yamakhompuyutha eNyuvesi yaseCentral Missouri, uthole inombolo enkulu kunazo zonke kuze kube manje ongakwazi ukuyidivayida ngayo ngokwayo ngoJanuwari 25.

translation.en: Several people verified the discovery using different hardware and software by the beginning of February and it was announced on Tuesday.
translation.zu: Abantu abaningana baqinisekise okutholakele ngokusebenzisa imishini kanye nezinhlelo zokusebenza zamakhompyutha ngasekuqaleni kukaFebruwari futhi kumenyezelwe ngoLwesibili.

translation.en: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life.
translation.zu: Amatshe awayo esuka emkhathini kungenzeka ukuthi ayengumthombo wamanzi athunyelwe emhlabeni kanye nezinsalela zezinto eziphilayo ezingakha amaphrotheni futhi zisekele ukuphila.

translation.en: Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.
translation.zu: Ososayensi banethemba lokuqonda indlela amapulanethi akheka ngayo, ikakhulukazi indlela uMhlaba owakheke ngayo, njengoba amatshe asuka emkhathini eshayisene noMhlaba kudala.

translation.en: Cuomo, 53, began his governorship earlier this year and signed a bill last month legalizing same-sex marriage.
translation.zu: U-Cuomo, oneminyaka engu-53, waqala ukubusa ekuqaleni kulo nyaka futhi wasayina umthetho ovivinywayo ngenyanga edlule ogunyaza ukushada kwabantu bobulili obufanayo.

translation.en: He referred to the rumors as "political chatter and silliness".
translation.zu: Ubhekisele emahlebezini ngokuthi "ingevu yepolotiki kanye nobuthutha".

translation.en: He is speculated to make a run for president in 2016.
translation.zu: Kufuniselwa ukuthi uzokhankasela ukuba umongameli ngo-2016.

translation.en: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions.
translation.zu: I-NextGen indlela i-FAA ethi izovumela indiza ukuba indize imizila emifishane futhi yonge izigidi zamagalani wamafutha unyaka ngamunye futhi inciphise i-carbon ekhishwa emkhathini.

translation.en: It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.
translation.zu: Isebenzisa ubuchwepheshe obusekelwe esiphuphuthekini kunobuchwepheshe bakudala obusekelwe kuyi-radar yaphansi ukuvumela abalawuli bezinto ezihamba emoyeni ukuthola indawo indiza ekuyo ngokunemba okukhulu nokunika abashayeli bezindiza ukwaziswa okunembe kakhudlwana.

translation.en: No extra transport is being put on and overground trains will not stop at Wembley, and car parking and park-and-ride facilities are unavailable at the ground.
translation.zu: Azikho izinto zokuthutha ezibekwayo futhi izitimela ezihamba phezulu ngeke zime eWembli, futhi ukupaka izimoto kanye nezindawo zokupaka nokugibela azitholakali enkundleni.

translation.en: Fears of lack of transportation raised the possibility that the game would be forced to play behind closed doors without the team's supporters.
translation.zu: Ukwesaba kokungabi khona kwezinto zokuthutha kwenze ukuthi kube nokwenzeka ukuthi umdlalo uphoqelelwe ukudlalwa ngasese ngaphandle kwabathandi beqembu.

translation.en: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands.
translation.zu: Ucwaningo olushicilelwe ngoLwesine kumagazini weSayensi lubike ngokwakhiwa kwezinhlobo ezintsha zezinyoni eZiqhingini zase-Ecuadore eGalápagos.

translation.en: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
translation.zu: Ubacwaningi abavela eNyuvesi yasePrinceton eMelika kanye naseNyuvesi yase-Uppsala eSweden babike ukuthi izidalwa ezintsha ziziphendukele ngezizukulwane ezimbili kuphela, nakuba lenqubo bekukholelwa ukuthi ithatha isikhathi eside, ngenxa yokuzalela phakathi kwezintaka zika-Darwin ezitholakala kuleyo ndawo kuphela, ama-Geospiza fortes, kanye nezintaka ze-cactus ezithuthele lapho, ama-Geospiza conirostris.

translation.en: Gold may be worked into all sorts of shapes. It can be rolled into tiny shapes.
translation.zu: Igolide lingenziwa libe noma isiphi isibumbeko. Lingagingqwa libe yizibumbeko ezincane..

translation.en: It can be pulled into thin wire, which can be twisted and plaited. It can be hammered or rolled into sheets.
translation.zu: Ingadonswa ibe ucingo oluncinyanyane, olungasontwa noma lulukwe. Lungabethelwa noma lugoqwe lube amashidi.

translation.en: It can be made very thin, and stuck onto other metal. It can be made so thin that it was sometimes used to decorate the hand-painted pictures in books called "illuminated manuscripts".
translation.zu: Ingenziwa ibe lula, bese inamathiselwa kwenye insimbi. Ingenziwa ibe lula kangangokuthi kwesinye isikhathi yayisetshenziselwa ukuhlobisa izithombe ezidwetshwe ngesandla ezincwadini ezibizwa ngokuthi "illuminated manuscripts".

translation.en: This is called a chemical's pH. You can make an indicator using red cabbage juice.
translation.zu: Lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi i-pH yekhemikhali. Ungenza inkomba ngokusebenzisa umhluzi weklabishi ebomvu.

translation.en: The cabbage juice changes color depending on how acidic or basic (alkaline) the chemical is.
translation.zu: Ijusi yeklabishi ishintsha umbala kuye ngokuthi ikhemikhali ino-asidi noma i-alikhali engakanani.

translation.en: The pH level is indicated by the amount of Hydrogen (the H in pH) ions in the tested chemical.
translation.zu: Izinga le-pH likhonjwa inani lama-ion weHydrogen (i-H kuyi-pH) kuyikhemikhali elihlolwayo.

translation.en: Hydrogen ions are protons that had their electrons stripped off them (since Hydrogen atoms consist of one proton and one electron).
translation.zu: Ama-ion weHydrogen amaphrothoni lawo ekususwe ama-elektroni wawo kuwo (njengoba ama-athomu weHydrogen enziwa iphrothoni elilodwa kanye ne-elektroni elilodwa).

translation.en: Swirl the two dry powders together and then, with clean wet hands, squeeze them into a ball.
translation.zu: Yaluzisa izimpuphu ezimbili ezomile bese, ngezandla ezihlanzekile ezimanzi, uzicindezele zibe yindingiliza.

translation.en: The moisture on your hands will react with the outer layers, which will feel funny and form a sort of shell.
translation.zu: Umswakamo osezandleni zakho uzohlangana nongqimba olungaphandle, okuzoba nomuzwa oxakayo futhi kwenze uhlobo lwegobongo.

translation.en: The cities of Harappa and Mohenjo-daro had a flush toilet in almost every house, attached to a sophisticated sewage system.
translation.zu: Amadolobha waseHarappa kanye naseMohenjo-daro ayenedlu yangasese eshaywayo cishe kuzo zonke izindlu, ehlanganiswe nendlela eyinkimbinkimbi yokuthutha indle.

translation.en: Remains of sewage systems have been found in the houses of the Minoan cities of Crete and Santorini in Greece.
translation.zu: Insalela yamapayipi athutha indle itholakele ezindlini zamadolobha wase-Minoan waseKhrithi nase-Santorini eGrisi.

translation.en: There were also toilets in ancient Egypt, Persia and China. In Roman civilization, toilets were sometimes part of public bath houses where men and women were together in mixed company.
translation.zu: Zazikhona izindlu zangasese eGibhithe, ePheresiya, kanye naseShayina yamandulo. Empucukweni yaseRoma, izindlu zangasese kwesinye isikhathi kwakuyingxenye yezindlu zokugezela zomphakathi lapho abasilisa nabesifazana babehlangana ndawonye.

translation.en: When you call someone who is thousands of miles away, you are using a satellite.
translation.zu: Uma ushayela ucingo umuntu othile okude ngamamayela ayinkulungwane, usebenzisa isiphuphutheki.

translation.en: The satellite in space gets the call and then reflects it back down, almost instantly.
translation.zu: Isiphuphutheki esisemkhathini sithola ucingo bese siluthumela emuva ezansi, cishe ngaleso sikhathi.

translation.en: The satellite was sent into space by a rocket. Scientists use telescopes in space because the Earth’s atmosphere distorts some of our light and view.
translation.zu: Isethilayithi ithunyelwe emkhathini kusentshenziswa i-rocket. Ososayensi basebenzise izibona kude ezisemkhathini ngoba umkhathi uphazamisa okunye kokukhanya kwethu kanye nokubona.

translation.en: It takes a giant rocket over a 100 feet high to put a satellite or telescope in space.
translation.zu: Kudingeka irokhethi enkulu engaphezu kwamafidiangu-100 ukuphakama ukubeka isiphuphutheki noma ithelisikobho emkhathini.

translation.en: The wheel has changed the world in incredible ways. The biggest thing that the wheel has done for us is given us much easier and faster transportation.
translation.zu: Isondo seliguqule umhlaba ngezindlela ezimangalisayo. Into enkulu ukuthi isondo elisenzele yona ukusinika indlela yokuthutha elula neshesha kakhulu.

translation.en: It has brought us the train, the car, and many other transportation devices.
translation.zu: Isilethele isitimela, imoto, kanye nezinye izisetshenziswa zokuthutha.

translation.en: Under them are more medium sized cats that eat medium sized prey ranging from rabbits to antelopes and deer.
translation.zu: Ngaphansi kwazo kukhona amakati amancanyana ngobukhulu adla inyama ebanjelwa ukudliwakusuka kunogwaja kuya ezinyamazaneni.

translation.en: Finally, there are many small cats (including loose pet cats) that eat the far more numerous small prey like insects, rodents, lizards, and birds.
translation.zu: Ekugcineni, kunamakati amaningi amancane (kuhlanganise namakati afuywayo azizulelayo) adla izilwanyane ezizingelwayo eziningi kakhulu njengezinambuzane, izilwane eziququdayo, izibankwa, kanye nezinyoni.

translation.en: The secret to their success is the concept of the niche, a special job each cat holds that keeps it from competing with others.
translation.zu: Imfihlo yempumelelo yabo umcabango wesikhundla, umsebenzi okhethekile ikati ngalinye elinawo olenza lingancintisani namanye.

translation.en: Lions are the most social cats, living in large groups called prides.
translation.zu: Amabhubesi angamakati anobudlelwane kakhulu, aphila ngamaqembu amakhulu abizwa ngokuthi umhlambi.

translation.en: Prides are made up of one to three related adult males, along with as many as thirty females and cubs.
translation.zu: Imihlambi yakhiwa iduna elilodwa noma amathathu ahlobene, ngokufanayo nezinsikazi ezintathu kanye namawundlu.

translation.en: The females are usually closely related to each other, being a large family of sisters and daughters.
translation.zu: Abesifazane ngokuvamile bahlobene, okuwumndeni omkhulu wodadewabo noma amadodakazi.

translation.en: Lion prides act much like packs of wolves or dogs, animals surprisingly similar to lions (but not other big cats) in behavior, and also very deadly to their prey.
translation.zu: Ivuyo lamabhubesi liziphatha njengomhlambi wamanketshane, izilwane ezifana namabhubesi ngokumangalisayo (kodwa hhayi amanye amakati amakhulu) ngokuziphatha, kanye futhi nokuba yingozi ezilwaneni ezizizingelayo.

translation.en: A well rounded athlete, the tiger can climb (though not well), swim, leap great distances and pull with five times the force of a strong human.
translation.zu: Umgadli ophelele, ihlosi lingakhuphuka (yize lingakwazi kahle), libhukude, ligxume amabanga amade futhi lidonse ngamandla womuntu onamandla aphindwe kasihlanu.

translation.en: The tiger is in the same group (Genus Panthera) as lions, leopards, and jaguars. These four cats are the only ones who can roar.
translation.zu: Ithayiga lisesigabeni esifanayo (Genus Panthera) njengamabhubesi, izingwe, kanye nama-jaguar. Lawa makati amane yiwo kuphela akwazi ukubhonga.

translation.en: The tiger's roar is not like the full-voiced roar of a lion, but more like a sentence of snarly, shouted words.
translation.zu: Ukubhonga kwehlosi akufani ncamashi nokubhonga kwengonyama, kodwa kucishe kufane nomusho wamagama entukuthelo, amenyezwayo.

translation.en: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is.
translation.zu: Amakati wasendle amakhulu waseMelika athanda ukudla izilwane ezincane. Azobamba izimfene, izinyoka, izilwane eziququdayo kanye nezinyoni uma angakwazi. Cishe zonke izilwane ezizingelwa yilawa makati zincane kakhulu kunawo.

translation.en: Scientists think that ocelots follow and find animals to eat (prey) by smell, sniffing for where they've been on the ground.
translation.zu: Ososayensi bakholelwa ukuthi amakati amakhulu waseMelika alandelela futhi athola izilwane zokuzidla (izilwane ezizingelwayo) ngokunuka, efufuza lapho bezikhona phansi.

translation.en: They can see very well in the dark with night vision, and move very stealthily, too. Ocelots hunt their prey by blending in with their surroundings then pouncing on their prey.
translation.zu: Ayakwazi ukubona kahle kakhulu ebumnyameni ngekhono lokubona ebusuku, abuye ahambe ngesinyenyela esikhulu, futhi. Ama-ocelot azingela izisulu zawo ngokuzifanisa nendawo akuyo bese agxumela izisulu zawo.

translation.en: When a small group of living things (a small population) gets separated from the main population that they came from (like if they move over a mountain range or a river, or if they move to a new island so that they can't easily move back) they will often find themselves in a different environment than they were in before.
translation.zu: Lapho iqembu elincane lezinto eziphilayo (inani elincane) lihlukana eqenjini elikhulu elisuka kulo (cishe lapho liya ngaphesheya kokhahlamba lwentaba noma umfula, noma uma liya esiqhingini esisha kangangokuba lingakwazi ukubuyela emuva kalula) ngokuvamile lizozithola endaweni ehlukile kunaleyo ebezikuyo ngaphambili.

translation.en: This new environment has different resources and different competitors, so the new population will need different features or adaptations to be a strong competitor than what they had needed before.
translation.zu: Le ndawo entsha inezinsizakusebenza ezihlukile nabancintisani abahlukene, ngakho-ke umphakathi omusha uzodinga izici ezihlukile noma ukuzivumelanisa nezimo ukuze ube ngabancintisani abaqinile kunalokho ababekudinga ngaphambilini.

translation.en: The original population hasn't changed at all, they still need the same adaptations as before.
translation.zu: Izidalwa ezazikhona zasekuqaleni azikashintshi, zisadinga indlela yokuphila efana neyangaphambili.

translation.en: Over time, as the new population begins to adapt to their new environment, they start to look less and less like the other population.
translation.zu: Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, njengoba iqembu elisha liqala ukujwayela indawo yalo entsha, liqala ukuya libukeka lingafani neqembu elinye.

translation.en: Eventually, after thousands or even millions of years, the two populations will look so different that they can't be called the same species.
translation.zu: Ekugcineni, ngemva kweminyaka eyizinkulungwane noma ngisho eyizigidi, amaqembu amabili azobukeka ehlukile kangangokuba angeke abizwe ngokuthi uhlobo olulodwa.

translation.en: We call this process speciation, which just means the formation of new species. Speciation is an unavoidable consequence and a very important part of evolution.
translation.zu: Sibiza lokhu kwenza ngokuthi ukwakheka, okushe nje ukwakhekha kwezinhlobo ezintsha. Lokhu kwakheka umphumela ongakwemeki kanye nengxenye ebaluleke kakhulu yokuziphendukela kwemvelo.

translation.en: Plants make oxygen which humans breathe, and they take in carbon-dioxide which humans exhale (that is, breathe out).
translation.zu: Izitshalo zenza i-oxygen leyo ephefumulwa abantu, futhi zithatha i-carbon-dioxide leyo ekhishwa abantu (okungukuthi, ukuphefumula ukhiphe umoya).

translation.en: Plants make their food from the sun by photosynthesis. They also provide shade.
translation.zu: Izitshalo zenza ukudla kwazo nge-photosynthesis. Zibuye zenze nomthunzi.

translation.en: We make our houses from plants and make clothes from plants. Most foods that we eat are plants. Without plants, animals could not survive.
translation.zu: Senza izindlu zethu ngezitshalo futhi senza nezingubo ngezitshalo. Ukudla okuningi esikudlayo izitshalo. Ngaphandle kwezitshalo, izilwane angeke ziqhubeke ziphila.

translation.en: Mosasaurus was the apex predator of its time, so it feared nothing, except other mosasaurs.
translation.zu: I-mosasaurus bekuyisilwane esizingelayo esiyinhloko ngesikhathi sayo, ngakho-ke yayingesabi lutho, ngaphandle kwama-mosasaurus amanye.

translation.en: Its long jaws were studded with more than 70 razor-sharp teeth, along with an extra set in the roof of its mouth, meaning that there was no escape for anything that crossed its path.
translation.zu: Imihlathi yayo emide eyayihlome ngamazinyo acijise okwensingo angaphezu kuka-70, kanye namanye engeziwe phezu komlomo wayo, okusho ukuthi kwakungekho lutho esondela eduze kwayo eyayingaphunyuka.

translation.en: We don't know for sure, but it may have had a forked tongue. Its diet included turtles, large fish, other mosasaurs, and it may even have been a cannibal.
translation.zu: Asazi ngokuqinisekile, kodwa kungenzeka ukuthi yayinolimi olusamfoloko. Ukudla eyayikudla kuhlanganisa izimfudu, izinhlanzi ezinkulu, ama-mosasaurus amanye, futhi kungenzeka nokuthi yayiyizimu.

translation.en: It also attacked anything that entered the water; even a giant dinosaur such as T. rex would be no match for it.
translation.zu: Yayibuye ihlasele noma yini engena emanzini; ngisho ne-dinosaur enkulu njenge-T.rex yayingeke ikwazi ukumelana nayo.

translation.en: While most of their food would be familiar to us, Romans did have their share of strange or unusual feast items, including wild boar, peacock, snails, and a type of rodent called a dormouse
translation.zu: Ngenkathi iningi lokukudla kwabo kungaba okujwayelekile kuthina, amaRoma eyenesabelo sabo sezinto zemikhosi ezingajwayelekile, kubandakanya izingulube zasendle, ipigogo, iminenke, nohlobo lwegundane olubizwa nge-dormouse

translation.en: Another difference was that while the poor people and the woman ate their food while sitting in chairs, the rich men liked to have banquets together where they would lounge on their sides while they ate their meals.
translation.zu: Omunye umehluko kwakuwukuthi nakuba abantu abampofu kanye nabesifazane babedla ukudla kwabo babe behlezi ezihlalweni, amadoda acebile ayethanda ukuba namadili ndawonye lapho ayehlala khona ngezinhlangothi kuyilapho edla ukudla kwawo.

translation.en: Ancient Roman meals couldn't have included foods that came to Europe from America or from Asia in later centuries.
translation.zu: Ukudla kwaseRoma yamandulo kwakungeke kuhlanganise ukudla okufike eYurophu kuvela eMelika noma kuvela e-Asia emakhulwini eminyaka alandelayo.

translation.en: For instance, they didn't have corn, nor tomatoes, nor potatoes, nor cocoa, and no ancient Roman ever tasted a turkey.
translation.zu: Ngokwesibonelo, babengenawo ummbila, noma otamatisi, noma amazambane, noma i-cocoa, futhi akekho umuntu waseRoma yamandulo oke wanambitha ikalikuni.

translation.en: The Babylonians built each of their gods a primary temple that was considered the home of the god.
translation.zu: AbaseBhabhiloni bakhela izithixo zabo ngazinye ithempeli eliyinhloko elalibhekwa njengekhaya lesithixo.

translation.en: People would bring sacrifices to the gods and the priests would try to attend to the needs of the gods through ceremonies and festivals.
translation.zu: Abantu abaletha imihlatshelo konkulunkulu nakubaphristi bazozama ukunika onkulunkulu izidingo zabo ngemigidi nemikhosi.

translation.en: Each temple had an open temple courtyard and then an inner sanctuary that only the priests could enter.
translation.zu: Ithempeli ngalinye lalinegceke elivulekile lethempeli kanye nendawo engcwele ephakathi lapho kwakungena khona umphristi kuphela.

translation.en: Sometimes special pyramid shaped towers, called ziggurats, were built to be a part of the temples.
translation.zu: Ngezinye izikhathi imibhoshongo ekhethekile engunxa-ntathu, ebizwa ngokuthi ama-ziggurat, yayakhiwe ukuze ibe ingxenye yamathempeli.

translation.en: The top of the tower was special sanctuary for the god.
translation.zu: Isiqongo sombhoshongo kwakuyindawo engcwele ekhethekile yesithixo.

translation.en: In the warm climate of the Middle East, the house was not so important.
translation.zu: Esimweni sezulu esifudumele saseMpumalanga ePhakathi, indlu beyingabalulekanga kakhulu.

translation.en: Most of the life of the Hebrew family happened in the open air.
translation.zu: Isikhathi esiningi impilo yemindeni yamaHebheru yenzeka endaweni evulekile.

translation.en: Women did the cooking in the yard; stores were just open counters looking into the street. Stone was used for building houses.
translation.zu: Owesifazane wayepheka egcekeni, izitolo kwakungamatafula avulwayo abheke emgwaqweni. Amatshe ayesetshenziselwa ukwakha izindlu.

translation.en: There were no large forests in the land of Canaan, so wood was extremely expensive.
translation.zu: Ayengekho amahlathi amakhulu ezweni laseKhanani, ngakho izingodo zazibiza kakhulu.

translation.en: Greenland was settled sparsely. In the Norse sagas they say that Erik the Red was exiled from Iceland for murder, and when travelling further west, found Greenland and named it Greenland.
translation.zu: I-Greenland yayihlelwe kancane. E-Norse Segas bathi u-Erik the Red waboshwa e-Iceland ngenxa yokubulala, futhi lapho ehambela eNtshonalanga, wathola i-Greenland wase eyibiza ngokuthi i-Greenland.

translation.en: But regardless of his discovery, Eskimo tribes were already living there at the time.
translation.zu: Kodwa naphezu kokuba etholakele, isizwe sama-Eskiro besilokhu sihlala lapho ngaleso sikhathi.

translation.en: Though each country was 'Scandinavian', there were many differences between the people, kings, customs and history of Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Iceland.
translation.zu: Nakuba izwe ngalinye beliyi-‘Scandinavian’, bekunokungefani okuningi phakathi kwabantu, amakhosi, amasiko, kanye nomlando wase-Denmark, e-Sweden, e-Norway kanye nase-Iceland.

translation.en: If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence.
translation.zu: Uma wake wayibuka imovie i-National Treasure, ungafunga ukuthi ibalazwe lomcebo lalibhalwe ngemuva kweSimemezelo Sokuzimela.

translation.en: However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map.
translation.zu: Noma kunjalo, lokho akulona iqiniso. Noma kunokuthile okubhalwe ngemuva kwencwadi, akuyona imephu eyigugu.

translation.en: Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words "Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down.
translation.zu: Okubhalwe ngemuva eNcazelweni Yokuzimela bekungamazwi “ENcazelo Yokuqala Yokuzimela yangomhlaka-4 Julayi 1776”. Umbhalo ovela ekugcineni kwencwadi, obheke phansi.

translation.en: While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage.
translation.zu: Yize kungekho owaziyo ngokuqinisekile ukuthi ngubani oyibhalile, kuyaziwa ukuthi ekuqaleni kokuphila kwayo, idokhumenti yesikhumba (inobukhulu obungamayintshi angu-29¾ ngamayintshi angu-24½) yayisongwa ukuze igcinwe.

translation.en: So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label.
translation.zu: Ngakho-ke, cishe umcabango wafakwa njengophawu kalula.

translation.en: The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free.
translation.zu: Ukufika kwamabutho Ahlangene kanye nezimpi ezalandela zakhulula inyakatho yeFulansi, kodwa iningizimu yayingakakhululeki.

translation.en: It was ruled by the "Vichy" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them.
translation.zu: Yayibuswa amaFulentshi wase-“Vinchy”. Laba bekungabantu baseFulansi ababenze ukuthula neJalimane ngo-1940 futhi besebenzisana nabaphangi esikhundleni sokuthi balwe nabo.

translation.en: On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called "Operation Dragoon".
translation.zu: Ngo-15 Agusti 1940, Izivunani zahlasela iningizimu France, futhi ukuhlasela kwabizwa “Umsebenzi Dragoon”.

translation.en: In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany.
translation.zu: Ngamasonto amabili nje amasosha ase-Melika kanye nawase-French Ekhululekile akhiphe iningizimu France ezingxoxweni zokuhweba futhi asephendukela eJalimane

translation.en: A civilization is a singular culture shared by a significant large group of people who live and work co-operatively, a society.
translation.zu: Umphakathi wesintu isiko elilodwa elihlanganyelwa iqembu elikhulu labantu abahla futhi basebenze ndawonye, umphakathi.

translation.en: The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society.
translation.zu: Igama elithi civilization lisuka egameni lesiLatin elithi civilis, okusho impucuko, elihlobene nelesiLatin elithi civis, elisho isakhamuzi, kanye nelithi civitas, elisho idolobha noma isifundazwe, futhi lokho ngenye indlela kubuye kuchaze ubukhulu bomphakathi.

translation.en: City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination.
translation.zu: Izifundazwe zandulela izizwe. Isiko lomphakathi lisho ukudlulisela ulwaze ezizukulwaneni eziningana, umkhondo ongokwesiko ohlala ukhona kanye nokusakazwa okuhle kokwaziswa.

translation.en: Minor cultures often vanish without leaving relevant historic evidence and fail to be recognized as proper civilizations.
translation.zu: Amasiko amancane ngokuvamile ayanyamalala ngaphandle kokushiya ubufakazi obungokomlando futhi ayahluleka ukuqashelwa njengemiphakathi yangempela.

translation.en: During the Revolutionary War, the thirteen states first formed a weak central government—with the Congress being its only component—under the Articles of Confederation.
translation.zu: Phakathi neMpi Yezinguqugo, izifunda eziyishumi nantathu zaqala zakha uhulumeni obuthakathaka—uKhongolose kuyisici sawo sodwa—ngaphansi kwe-Articles of Confederation.

translation.en: Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts.
translation.zu: Ukhongolose wabe engenawo amandla okubeka intela, futhi, ngenxa yokuthi bokungekho sigungu sezwe noma noma isigungu sokwahlulela, uncike ezikhulwini zombuso, ezazingabambisani izikhathi ezingi, ukuphoqelela yonke imithetho yawo.

translation.en: It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states.
translation.zu: Yayingenalo futhi igunya lokweqa imithetho yentela nokuthelisa ngempahla phakathi kwezifunda.

translation.en: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.
translation.zu: Imithetho beyidinga ukuba zonke izifunda zivume ngaphambi kokuba ilungiswe futhi izifunda zithathe uhulumeni omkhulu njengongabalulekile kakhulu kangangokuba abameleli bazo babehlala bangekho.

translation.en: Italy's national football, along with German national football team is the second most successful team in the world and were the FIFA World Cup champions in 2006.
translation.zu: Ibhola lezinyawo lezwe laseNtaliyane, kanye neqembu lebhola lezinyawo lezwe laseJalimane iqembu lesibili eliphumelele kakhulu emhlabeni futhi bekuyizingqwele zeNdebe yoMhlaba yeFIFA ngo-2006.

translation.en: Popular sports include football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey and F1 motor racing.
translation.zu: Imidlalo ethandwayo ihlanganisa ibhola lezinyawo, i-basketball, i-volleyball, ibhola lasemanzini, umngcweko, iragbhi, ukugibela amabhayisikili, ihoki yaseqhweni, ihoki evamile kanye nomncintiswano wezimoto zeF1.

translation.en: Winter sports are most popular in the Northern regions, with Italians competing in international games and Olympic events.
translation.zu: Imidlalo yasebusika ithandwa kakhulu ezindaweni eziseNyakatho, lapho amaNtaliyane encintisana khona emidlalweni yamazwe onke kanye nasemidlalweni yama-Olimpiki.

translation.en: Japans holds nearly 7,000 islands (the biggest being Honshu), making Japan the 7th largest island in the world!
translation.zu: Ijapani ineziqhingi ezicishe zibe ngu-7000 (esikhulu kunazo zonke iHonshu), okwenza iJapani isiqhingi sesi-7 esikhulu kunazo zonke emhlabeni!

translation.en: Due to the cluster/group of islands Japan has, Japan is often referred to, on a geographical stance, as an "archipelago"
translation.zu: Ngenxa yenqwaba/iqembu leziqhingi iJapani enazo, iJapani ivame ukubizwa ngokuthi, ngenxa yendawo ekuyo, njenge-"archipelago"

translation.en: Taiwan beginning start way back in 15th century where European sailors passing by record the island’s name as Ilha Formosa, or beautiful island.
translation.zu: Ukusungulwa kweTaiwan kuqala kudala ngekhulu lama-15 leminyaka lapho amatilosi aseYurophu edlula ebhala igama lesiqhingi ngokuthi i-Ilha formosa, noma isiqhingi esihle.

translation.en: In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations.
translation.zu: Ngo1624,inkampani yaseNdiya yeDutch East yamisa isikhungo eningizimu ntshonalanga Taiwan, iqalisa ukushintshwa kokukhiqizwa kokusanhlamvu komdabu futhi iqasha izisebenzi zaseShayina ukuba zisebenze emasimini welayisi noshukela.

translation.en: In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885.
translation.zu: Ngo-1683, amabutho obukhosi buka-Qing (1644-1912) athatha izindawo ezingasogwini ezisentshonalanga nasenyakatho ne-Taiwan futhi amisa i-Taiwan njengesifundazwe sombuso ka-Qing ngo-1885.

translation.en: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.
translation.zu: Ngo-1895, ngemva kokuhlulwa eMpini Yokuqala yamaJapani yase—ino (1894-1895), uhulumeni wase-Qing usayina Isivumelwano se-Simonoseki, ngaso edlulisela iTaiwan eJapani, ebusa isiqhingi kuze kube ngu-1945.

translation.en: Machu Picchu consist of three main structures, namely Intihuatana, the Temple of the Sun, and the Room of the Three Windows.
translation.zu: IMachu Picchu yenziwa izakhiwo ezintathu eziyinhloko, okungukuthi i-Intihuatana, i-Temple of the Sun, kanye ne-Room of the Three Windows.

translation.en: Most of the buildings on the edges of the complex have been rebuilt in order to give tourists a better idea of how they originally appeared.
translation.zu: Izakhiwo eziningi onqenqemeni lwendawo yokuhlala zakhiwe kabusha ukuzi zinikeze izivakashi umqondo ongcono wendlela ezazibukeka ngayo ekuqaleni.

translation.en: By 1976, thirty percent of Machu Picchu had been restored and restoration continues till today.
translation.zu: Ngo-1976, amaphesenti angamashumi amathathu weMachu Picchu ayebuyiselwe esimweni sasekuqaleni futhi ukubuyiselwa kusaqhubeka kuze kube namuhla.

translation.en: For example, the most common still image photography format in the world is 35mm, which was the dominant film size at the close of the analog film era.
translation.zu: Ngokwesibonelo, indlela evamile kakhulu yohlobo lwesithombe emhlabeni ingu-35mm, ewubukhulu obufanayo nobefilimu ekupheleni kwesiqephu senkathi yamafilimu.

translation.en: It is still produced today, but more importantly its aspect ratio has been inherited by digital camera image sensor formats.
translation.zu: Isenziwa nanamuhla, kodwa okubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi ubudlelwane bayo bobude nobukhulu buthathwe izimo zokuthungatha isithombe zekhamera yedijithali.

translation.en: The 35mm format is actually, somewhat confusingly, 36mm in width by 24mm in height.
translation.zu: Ifomethi ka-35mm empeleni, ngodidayo ngokunye, ingu-36mm ububanzi kuphindwe ngo-24mm ubude.

translation.en: The aspect ratio of this format (dividing by twelve to obtain the simplest whole-number ratio) is therefore said to be 3:2.
translation.zu: Isilinganiso sobubanzi ebudeni salefomethi (ukudivayida ngeshumi nambili ukuze uthole isilinganiso senombolo ephelele elula) ngakho-ke kuthiwa singu-3:2.

translation.en: Many common formats (APS family of formats, for example) are equal to or closely approximate this aspect ratio.
translation.zu: Amafomethi amaningi avamile (iqoqo lamafomethi le-APS, ngokwesibonelo) ayalingana noma acishe alingane nalesi silinganiso sobubanzi ebudeni.

translation.en: The much-abused and often-ridiculed rule of thirds is a simple guideline creating dynamism while keeping a measure of order in an image.
translation.zu: Lomthetho wezingxenye ezintathu esetshenziswa kabi kakhulu nonganakwa ngokuvamile isiqondiso esilula sokwenza ubuhle ube ugcina izinga lokuhleleka esithombeni.

translation.en: It states that the most effective place for the main subject is at the intersection of lines dividing the image into thirds vertically and horizontally (see example).
translation.zu: Ithi indawo ephumelela kakhulu ngesihloko esikhulu ilapho imigqa ihlangana khona ukuze ihlukanise isithombe kathathu ngokuqondile nangokuvundlile (bheka isibonelo).

translation.en: During this period of European history, the Catholic Church, which had become rich and powerful, came under scrutiny.
translation.zu: Phakathi nalenkathi yomlando waseYurophu, iSonto lamaKatolika, elalicebile futhi linamandla, lahlolisiswa.

translation.en: For over a thousand years the Christian religion had bound European states together despite differences in language and customs. I
translation.zu: Ngaphezu kweminyaka eyinkulungwane inkolo yobuKhristu yahlanganisa amazwe waseYurophu ndawonye ngaphezu kokuhluka kwezilimi namasiko.

translation.en: Its all-pervading power affected everyone from king to commoner.
translation.zu: Amandla waso akuyo yonke indawo athinta wonke umuntu kusukela enkosini kuya emuntwini ovamile.

translation.en: One of the main Christian tenets is that wealth should be used to alleviate suffering and poverty and that the monetary funds of the church are there specifically for that reason.
translation.zu: Enye yemigomo eyinhloko yobuKristu ukuthi ingcebo kufanele isetshenziselwe ukudambisa ukuhlupheka nobuphofu nokuthi imali yebandla ilapho ngenxa yaleso sizathu.

translation.en: The central authority of the church had been in Rome for over a thousand years and this concentration of power and money led many to question whether this tenet was being met.
translation.zu: Abaphathi abakhulu besonto babeseRoma iminyaka engaphezu kwenkulungwane futhi lokhu kuqoqana kwamandla nemali kwaholela abaningi ekusoleni ukuthi lomgomo wemfundiso uyafinyelelwa yini.

translation.en: Soon after the outbreak of hostilities, Britain initiated a naval blockade of Germany.
translation.zu: Ngokushesha ngemva kobutha, iBrithani yaqala ukuvimbezela iJalimane ngemikhumbi.

translation.en: The strategy proved effective, cutting off vital military and civilian supplies, although this blockade violated generally accepted international law codified by several international agreements of the past two centuries.
translation.zu: Isu libonakale lisebenza, ukususwa kwezinto ezidingwa ibutho lamasosha nabantu abavamile, nakuba lokhu kuvimbela kuphule imithetho yamazwe wonke elungiswe izivumelwano zamazwe amaningana wamakhulu amabili eminyaka adlule.

translation.en: Britain mined international waters to prevent any ships from entering entire sections of ocean, causing danger to even neutral ships.
translation.zu: I-Britain imba amanzi ezwekazi ukuze ivimbele imikhumbi ukuthi ingene kuyo yonke ingxenye yolwandle, okubangela izingozi ngisho nasemikhunjini evamile.

translation.en: Since there was limited response to this tactic, Germany expected a similar response to its unrestricted submarine warfare.
translation.zu: Njengoba bekunokusabela okulinganiselwe kulendlela, iJalimane beyilindele ukusabela okufanayo empini yayo engavinjelwe yemikhumbi yangaphansi kwamanzi.

translation.en: During the 1920s, the prevailing attitudes of most citizens and nations was that of pacifism and isolation.
translation.zu: Ngezikhathi zawo-1920, izimo zengqondo zezakhamuzi eziningi kanye nezizwe bezikholwa ukuzonda impi nokulwa kanye nokuzihlukanisa.

translation.en: After seeing the horrors and atrocities of war during World War I, nations desired to avoid such a situation again in the future.
translation.zu: Ngemva kokubona izenzo zonya nezishaqisayo zempi phakathi neMpi Yezwe I, izizwe zafisa ukugwema isimo esinjalo futhi esikhathini esizayo.

translation.en: In 1884, Tesla moved to the United States of America to accept a job with the Edison Company in New York City.
translation.zu: Ngo-1884 uTesla wathuthela eMelika ukwamukela umsebenzi neNkampani ka-Edison eDolobheni lase-New York.

translation.en: He arrived in the US with 4 cents to his name, a book of poetry, and a letter of recommendation from Charles Batchelor (his manager in his previous job) to Thomas Edison.
translation.zu: Ufike eMelika enamasenti angu-4 kuphela, incwadi yezinkondlo, kanye nencwadi yokutusa evela ku-Charles Batchelor (umphathi wakhe wasemsebenzini wakhe wangaphambili) iya kuThomas Edison.

translation.en: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty.
translation.zu: IShayina yamandulo yayinendlela ehlukile yokuveza izinkathi ezihlukile; isigaba ngasinye seShayina noma umndeni ngamunye owawubusa wawuwubukhosi obuhlukile.

translation.en: Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty.
translation.zu: Futhi phakathi kobukhosi ngabunye kwakuyiminyaka engazinzile yezifundazwe ezihlukene. Inkathi eyaziwa kakhulu kulezi kwakuyinkathi yemibuso emithathu eyenzeka iminyaka engama-60 phakathi koMbusokaHan noJin.

translation.en: During these periods fierce warfare took place between many nobles fighting for the throne.
translation.zu: Phakathi nalesi sikhathi kwakuba nezimpi ezinodlame phakathi kwababusi belwela ubukhosi.

translation.en: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
translation.zu: IMibuso Emithathu kwakungenye yenkathi yegazi eliningi kunazo zonke emlandweni waseShayina yakuDala, izinkulungwane zabantu zafa zilwela ukuhlala esihlalweni esiphakeme kakhulu esigodlweni esihle e-Xi’an.

translation.en: There are a lot of social and political effects such as the use of metric system, a shift from absolutism to republicanism, nationalism and the belief the country belongs to the people not to one sole ruler.
translation.zu: Kunemiphumela eminingi yezenhlalo neyezepolitiki efana nokusetshenziswa kohlelo lokulinganisa ngamamitha, ukusuka ekukholelweni ezimisweni eziphelele kuya ekusekeleni izimiso zoburiphabhuliki, ubuzwe kanye nenkolelo yokuthi izwe elabantu hhayi umbusi oyedwa.

translation.en: Also after the Revolution occupations were open to all male applicants allowing the most ambitious and successful to succeed.
translation.zu: Futhi ngemva kweNguquko izikhundla zazivulekele bonke abesilisa abafake izicelo okwavumela ukuthi abafuna ukuvelela kakhulu nokubahambela kahle baphumelele.

translation.en: Same goes for the military because instead of army rankings being based on class they were now based on cailaber.
translation.zu: Lokhu kufana nalokhu okwenzeka kumabutho amasosha kunokuba babheke inhlanga yakho bona bakhetha ukubeka i-cailaber ukuze banike amasosha ama-ratings.

translation.en: The French Revolution also inspired many other repressed working class people of other country's to began their own revolutions.
translation.zu: Ukuvukela kwaseFulansi kugqugquzele abanye abantu abasebenzayo abacindezelwe bakwamanye abazwe ukuthi baqale ukuvukela kwabo.

translation.en: Muhammad was deeply interested in matters beyond this mundane life. He used to frequent a cave that became known as “Hira‘” on the Mountain of “Noor” (light) for contemplation.
translation.zu: UMuhammad wayenesithakazelo esijulile ezindabeni zokuphila ezingaphathelene nezinto zalomhlaba. Wayevame ukuya emhumeni owaziwa ngokuthi “iHira” eNtabeni “yeNoor” (ukukhanya) ukuze ayozindla.

translation.en: he cave itself, which survived the times, gives a very vivid image of Muhammad’s spiritual inclinations.
translation.zu: Umhume ngokwawo, obekhona kuze kube manje, unikeza isithombe esicacile sokuthambekela okungokomoya kukaMuhammad.

translation.en: Resting on the top of one of the mountains north of Mecca, the cave is completely isolated from the rest of the world.
translation.zu: Umhume ohlezi phezu kwenye yezintaba zasenyakatho yase-Mecca, ukude kakhulu nomhlaba wonke.

translation.en: In fact, it is not easy to find at all even if one knew it existed. Once inside the cave, it is a total isolation.
translation.zu: Eqinisweni, akulula ukuyithola ngisho noma wazi ukuthi ikhona. Uma isingaphakathi emhumeni isuke isihlukaniswe ngokuphelele.

translation.en: Nothing can be seen other than the clear, beautiful sky above and the many surrounding mountains. Very little of this world can be seen or heard from inside the cave.
translation.zu: Akukho okubonakalayo phezulu ngaphandle kwesibhakabhaka esibalele, esihle kanye nezintaba eziningi ezizungezile. Kuncane kakhulu okwalelizwe okubonakalayo noma okuzwakalayo uma uphakathi emgedeni.

translation.en: The Great Pyramid at Giza is the only one of the seven wonders that is still standing today.
translation.zu: I-Great Pyramid yase-Giza iyokuphela kwizimangaliso eziyisikhombisa esamile nanamuhla.

translation.en: Built by the Egyptians in the third century BCE, the Great Pyramid is one of many large pyramid structures built to honor dead Pharaoh.
translation.zu: Yakhiwe ngabaseGibhithe ngekhulu lesithathu leminyaka BCE, iPhiramidi eliKhulu ngelinye lezakhiwo zamaphiramidi ezakhelwe ukuhlonipha uFaro oshonile.

translation.en: The Giza Plateau, or "Giza Necropolis" in the Egyptian Valley of the Dead contains several pyramids (of which the great pyramid is the largest), several small tombs, several temples, and the great Sphinx.
translation.zu: IThafa Eliphakeme laseGiza, noma “iGiza Necropolis” eSigodini sabaFile saseGibhithe linemibhoshongo emingxa-ntathu eminingana (leyo umbhoshongo omkhulu kuyiwo omkhulu kakhulu), amathuna amaningana amancane, amathempeli amaningana, kanye ne-Sphinx enkulu.

translation.en: The great pyramid was created to honor the Pharaoh Khufu, and many of the smaller pyramids, tombs, and temples were built to honor Khufu's wives and family members.
translation.zu: Umbhoshongo omkhulu ongunxa-ntathu wakhelwe ukuhlonipha uFaro uKhufu, futhi neminye imibhoshongo engunxa-ntathu emincanyana, amathuna, kanye namathempeli akhelwe ukuhlonipha inkosikazi kaKhufu kanye namalungu omndeni.

translation.en: The "up bow" mark looks like a V and the "down bow mark" like a staple or a square missing its bottom side.
translation.zu: Uphawu "lokukhothama umile" olubukeka njengo-V kanti "uphawu lokukhothama phansi" lubukeka njengesigaxa noma isikwele esishoda ngohlangothi lwaso olungaphansi.

translation.en: Up means you should start at the tip and push the bow, and down means you should start at the frog (which is where your hand is holding the bow) and pull the bow.
translation.zu: Phezulu kusho ukuthi kumelwe uqale ekugcineni bese uphusha umcibisholo, kanti phansi kusho ukuthi kumelwe uqale exoxweni (okusho ukuthi lapho ubambe khona umcibisholo) bese ugobisa umcibisholo.

translation.en: An up-bow usually generates a softer sound, while a down-bow is stronger and more assertive.
translation.zu: Umnsalo ophezulu ujwayele ukwenza umsindo opholile, kanti umnsalo ophansi wenza umsindo onamandla noqinile kakhudlwana.

translation.en: Feel free to pencil in your own marks, but remember the printed bowing marks are there for a musical reason, so they should usually be respected.
translation.zu: Zizwe ukhululekile ukubhala izimpawu zakho ngepensela, kepha khumbula izimpawu eziphrintiwe ezehlayo zikhona ngesizathu esingokomculo, ngakho-ke kufanele zihlonishwe.

translation.en: The terrified King Louis XVI, Queen Marie Antoinette their two young children (11 year old Marie Therese and four year old Louis-Charles) and the King's sister, Madam Elizabeth, on the 6th October 1789 were forced back to Paris from Versailles by a mob of market women.
translation.zu: Inkosi uLouis XVI ethukile, iNdlovukazi uMarie Antoinette kanye nezingane zabo ezincane ezimbili (uMarie Therese oneminyaka engu-11 ubudala kanye noLouis-Charles eneminyaka emine ubudala) kanye nodadewabo weNkosi, iNkosazana u-Elizabeth, ngomhla ka-6 Okthoba 1789 baphoqelelwa ukubuyela eParis besuka eVersailles uquqaba lwabesifazane basemakethe.

translation.en: In a carriage, they traveled back to Paris surrounded by a mob of people screaming and shouting threats against the King and Queen.
translation.zu: Besenkalishini, babuyela emuva ePherisi bezungezwe uquqaba lwabantu oluklabalasa kanye nokumemeza izinsongo ngokumelene neNkosi kanye neNdlovukazi.

translation.en: The mob of people forced the King And Queen to have their carriage windows wide open.
translation.zu: Isixuku sabantu siphoqelele iNkosi kanye neNdlovukazi ukuba bavule kakhulu amafasitela esithuthi sabo.

translation.en: At one point a member of the mob waved the head of a royal guard killed at Versailles in front of the terrified Queen.
translation.zu: Kunesikhathi lapho ilungu loquqaba lalifuna ukunqathuzisa ikhanda lonogada wasebukhosini obulawe eVersailles phambi kweNdlovukazi ethukile.

translation.en: The war expenditures of U.S. imperialism in the conquest of the Philippines were paid for by the Filipino people themselves.
translation.zu: Izindleko zempi zobukhosi baseMelika lapho inqoba iPhilippines zakhokhelwa abantu basePhilippines ngokwabo.

translation.en: They were compelled to pay taxes to the U.S. colonial regime to defray a major part of the expenditures and the interest on bonds floated in the name of the Philippine government through the Wall Street banking houses.
translation.zu: Baphoqelelwa ukukhokhela intela umbuso wobukoloni waseMelika ukukhokha ingxenye enkulu yezindleko futhi inzalo yamabhondi yabekwa egameni likahulumeni wasePhilippines ngezindlu zasebhange zeWall Street.

translation.en: Of course, the superprofits derived from the protracted exploitation of the Filipino people would constitute the basic gains of U.S. imperialism.
translation.zu: Kusobala, izinzuzo ezinkulu ezitholwe ngokuxhaphazwa okungapheli kwabantu baseFilipino benza izinzuzo eziyisisekelo zobukhosi baseMelika.

translation.en: To understand the Templars one must understand the context that prompted the creation of the order.
translation.zu: Ukuze uqonde amaTemplar umuntu kufanele aqonde umcabango owadala le nhlangano.

translation.en: The age where the events took place is commonly referred as the High Middle Ages the period of European history in the 11th, 12th, and 13th centuries (AD 1000–1300).
translation.zu: Inkathi lapho kube nesehlakalo khona ivame ukubhekiselwa ngokuthi Inkathi Ephakathi Ephezulu inkathi yomlando waseYurophu ngekhulu lama-11, lama-12, kanye nelama-13 leminyaka (AD 1000–1300).

translation.en: The High Middle Ages were preceded by the Early Middle Ages and followed by the Late Middle Ages, which by convention ends around 1500.
translation.zu: IHigh Middle Ages yandulelwa i-Early Middle Ages futhi yase ilandelwa iLate Middle Ages, ngokwenjwayelo iphela ngabo ends around 1500.

translation.en: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
translation.zu: Inkolelo yokumiselwa okungokwezobuchwepheshe igama elihlanganisa imibono eminingi esebenzayo, kusukela ekusebenziseni ezobuchwepheshe ezikhona noma ekutheni ezobuchwepheshe ziyadingeka kuya emuzweni oqinile wokuthi ukumiselwa kwesintu kuholwa umcabango ojulile ohlobene nemithetho yesayensi nokubonakala kwayo kwezobuchwepheshe.

translation.en: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
translation.zu: Izincazelo eziningi zenkolelo yokumiselwa okungokwezobuchwepheshe buhlanganyela imibono emibili evamile: ukuthi ukuthuthukiswa kwezobuchwepheshe ngokwakho kulandela indlela engaphezu kwethonya lesiko noma lepolotiki kakhulu, kanye nokuthi ezobuchwepheshe nazo "zinethonya" emiphakathini ezuzwayo ngokwemvelo, kunangezimo zenhlalo.

translation.en: For example, one might say that the motor car necessarily leads to the development of roads.
translation.zu: Ngokwesibonelo, othile angathi imoto iholela ekwakhiweni kwemigwaqo.

translation.en: However, a nationwide road network is not economically viable for just a handful of cars, so new methods of production are developed to reduce the cost of car ownership.
translation.zu: Nokho, imigwaqo exhumanisa izwe lonke ayizuzisi ngokomnotho ezimotweni ezimbalwa nje kuphela, ngakho izindlela ezintsha zokukhiqiza ziyenziwa ukunciphisa inani lokuba nemoto.

translation.en: Mass car ownership also leads to a higher incidence of accidents on the roads, which leads to the invention of new techniques in healthcare for repairing damaged bodies.
translation.zu: Ukuba nezimoto kwabantu abaningi nakho kuholela ezigamekweni eziphakeme zezingozi emigwaqweni, okuholela ekusungulweni kwezindlela ezintsha kwezempilo zokulungisa imizimba elimele.

translation.en: Romanticism had a large element of cultural determinism, drawn from writers such as Goethe, Fichte, and Schlegel.
translation.zu: Ezothando zinomthelela omkhulu ezinkolelweni zokuziphatha zamasiko, okuthathelwa kubabhali abanjengoGoethe, uFichte, kanye noSchlegel.

translation.en: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.
translation.zu: Esizindeni seRomanticism, indawo ibumba abantu ngabanye, futhi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi imikhuba nesiko ehlobene naleyo ndawo yavela, futhi lena, ivumelana nendawo yomphakathi, yayingcono kunemithetho emiswe ngokunganaki.

translation.en: In the manner that Paris is known as the fashion capital of the contemporary world, Constantinople was regarded as the fashion capital of feudal Europe.
translation.zu: Ngendlela iParis eyaziwa ngayo njengenhlokodolobha yezwe lamanje, iConstantinople yayibhekwa njengenhlokodolobha yezikhonzi zaseYurophu.

translation.en: Its renown for being an epicenter of luxury began in about 400 A.D. and lasted up until about 1100 A.D.
translation.zu: Yaziwa ngokuba yindawo yalapho kwaqala khona izinto zikanokusho cishe ngo-400 A.D. futhi yahlala cishe kwaze kaba u-1100 A.D.

translation.en: Its status declined during the twelfth century mainly due to the fact that Crusaders had returned bearing gifts such as silks and spices that were valued more than what Byzantine markets offered.
translation.zu: Isimo sayo sawohloka phakathi nekhulu leminyaka leshumi nambili ngokuyinhloko ngenxa yokuthi Abalweli Benkolo babebuye bephethe izipho ezinjengosilika nezinongo ezaziyigugu kunalezo imakethe yaseByzantium eyayinazo.

translation.en: It was at this time that the transfer of the title of Fashion Capital from Constantinople to Paris was made.
translation.zu: Kwakungalesi sikhathi lapho ukudluliselwa kwesiqu seNhlokodolobha yeMfashini kusuka eKhonstantinopheli kuya ePherisi kwenziwa.

translation.en: Gothic style peaked in the period between the 10th - 11th centuries and the 14th century.
translation.zu: Isitayela sobuGothiki sakhula ngenkathi ephakathi kwamakhulu weminyaka wama-10 -11 nekhulu leminyaka lama-14.

translation.en: At the beginning dress was heavily influenced by the Byzantine culture in the east.
translation.zu: Ekuqaleni ukwembatha kwakuthonywe kakhulu isiko laseByzantium empumalanga.

translation.en: However, due to the slow communication channels, styles in the west could lag behind by 25 to 30 year.
translation.zu: Noma kunjalo, ngenxa yokungabi khona kwezindlela zokuxhumana, izitayela zasentshonalanga zingasalela emuva ngeminyaka ewu-25 ukuya kwengu-30.

translation.en: towards the end of the Middle Ages western Europe began to develop their own style. one of the biggest developments of the time as a result of the crusades people began to use buttons to fasten clothing.
translation.zu: Ngasekupheleni kweNkathi Ephakathi intshonalanga Yurophu yaqala ukuthuthukisa isitayela sayo. Enye yentuthuko enkulu kakhulu yaleso sikhathi ngenxa yabalweli benkolo abantu baqala ukusebenzisa izinkinobho ukubopha izimpahla zokugqoka.

translation.en: Subsistence agriculture is agriculture carried out for the production of enough food to meet just the needs of the agriculturalist and his/her family.
translation.zu: Ukulimela ukuziphilisa ukulima okwenzelwa ukukhiqiza ukudla okwanele ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zomlimi kanye nomdeni wakhe kuphela.

translation.en: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
translation.zu: Ukulimela ukuziphilisa indlela elula, ngovamile okususelwe ezintweni eziphilayo, kusetshenziswa imbewu egciniwe yasendaweni enezici ezingokwemvelo kuhlanganiswe nokushintshashintsha izilimo noma ezinye izindlela ezilula zokwenza umkhiqizo ube mningi.

translation.en: Historically most farmers were engaged in subsistence agriculture and this is still the case in many developing nations.
translation.zu: Ngokomlando abalimi abaningi babelimela ukuziphilisa futhi kusenjalo emazweni amaningi athuthukayo.

translation.en: Subcultures bring together like-minded individuals who feel neglected by societal standards and allow them to develop a sense of identity.
translation.zu: Amaqembu ahlukile ahlanganisa abantu abazizwa benganakiwe yizimiso zomphakathi futhi abavumela ukwakha umuzwa wobuntu babo.

translation.en: Subcultures can be distinctive because of the age, ethnicity, class, location, and/or gender of the members.
translation.zu: Amasiko angaba ahlukanisayo ngenxa yeminyaka, uhlanga, isizinda, indawo, kanye/noma ubulili bamalungu.

translation.en: The qualities that determine a subculture as distinct may be linguistic, aesthetic, religious, political, sexual, geographical, or a combination of factors.
translation.zu: Izici eziveza iqembu elinyingxenye yesiko njengelihlukile kungaba ulimi, ubuhle, inkolo, ipolotiki, ubulili, indawo, noma inhlanganisela yezici.

translation.en: Members of a subculture often signal their membership through a distinctive and symbolic use of style, which includes fashions, mannerisms, and argot.
translation.zu: Amalungu weqembu eliyingxenye yesiko avamise ukubonakalisa ubulungu bawo ngokusebenzisa isitayela esihlukile nesimelela okuthile, esihlanganisa imfashini, ukuziphatha, kanye nendlela yokukhuluma.

translation.en: One of the most common methods used to illustrate the importance of socialization is to draw upon the few unfortunate cases of children who were, through neglect, misfortune, or wilful abuse, not socialized by adults while they were growing up.
translation.zu: Enye yezindlela eziningi kwezivamile ezisentshenziswa ukuchaza ukubaluleka kokuhlalisana nabanye ukusondelana nabambalwa ezinganeni, okwathi ngokunganakwa, ngeshwa, noma ngokuhlukunyezwa ngamabomu, bangajwayelaniswa nabantu abadala ngesikhathi besakhula.

translation.en: Such children are called "feral" or wild. Some feral children have been confined by people (usually their own parents); in some cases this child abandonment was due to the parents' rejection of a child's severe intellectual or physical impairment.
translation.zu: Izingane ezinjalo zibizwa ngokuthi “zinobulwane” noma ezasendle. Ezinye izingane ezinobulwane zigcinwe abanye abantu (ngokuvamile abazali bazo); kwezinye izimo lokhu kulahlwa kwezingane kwakungenxa yokungamukeli komzali ukukhubazeka okukhulu ngokwengqondo noma ngokomzimba kwengane.

translation.en: Feral children may have experienced severe child abuse or trauma before being abandoned or running away.
translation.zu: Izingane ezinobulwane kungenzeka ukuthi zihlangabezane nokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane okubi noma ukucindezeleka ngaphambi kokulahlwa noma ukubaleka.

translation.en: Others are alleged to have been brought up by animals; some are said to have lived in the wild on their own.
translation.zu: Ezinye kuthiwa zikhuliswe izilwane; ezinye kuthiwa zihlale endle zizodwa.

translation.en: When completely brought up by non-human animals, the feral child exhibits behaviors (within physical limits) almost entirely like those of the particular care-animal, such as its fear of or indifference to humans.
translation.zu: Lapho ikhuliswe ngokuphelele isilwane ekungesona umuntu, ingane enobulwane iveza ukuziphatha (ngokulinganiselwa okungokoqobo) cishe okufana ngokuphele nokwesilwane ebesiyinakekela, njengokusaba noma ukungabi nandaba nabantu.

translation.en: While project based learning should make learning easier and more interesting, scaffolding goes a step beyond.
