translation.en: No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack.
translation.zu: Kungakhathaliseki ukuthi zibukeka zithobile kangakanani, izinyathi zaseMelika, ama-elk, ama-moose, amabhere, futhi cishe nazo zonke izilwane ezinkulu zingahlasela.

translation.en: Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space.
translation.zu: Unyaka ngamunye, izivakashi eziningi ziyalimala ngenxa yokuthi azigcinanga ibanga elifanele. Lezi zilwane zinkulu, ezasendle, futhi zingaba ingozi, ngakho zinike isikhala sazo.

translation.en: In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
translation.zu: Ngaphezu kwalokho, phawula ukuthi iphunga libiza amabhere kanye nezinye izilwane zasendle, ngakho gwema ukuphatha noma ukupheka ukudla okunephunga futhi ugcine ikamu lihlanzekile.

translation.en: Apia is the capital of Samoa. The town is on the island of Upolu and has a population of just under 40,000.
translation.zu: I-Apia inhlokodolobha yaseSamoa. Idolobha lisesiqhingini sase-Upolu futhi linabantu abangaphansi nje kuka-40,000.

translation.en: Apia was founded in the 1850s and has been the official capital of Samoa since 1959.
translation.zu: I-Aphiya yasungulwa ngawo-1850 futhi yaba yinhlokodolobha engokomthetho yaseSamowa kusukela ngo-1959.

translation.en: The harbor was the site of an infamous naval standoff in 1889 when seven ships from Germany, the US, and Britain refused to leave the harbor.
translation.zu: Itheku bekuyindawo yempi esabekalo yemikhumbi lapho kwakuhlangene izaqha khona ngo-1889 lapho imikhumbi eyisikhombisa yaseJalimane, eMelika, kanye naseBrithani yenqabe ukusuka ethekwini.

translation.en: All the ships were sunk, except for one British cruiser. Nearly 200 American and German lives were lost.
translation.zu: Yonke imikhumbi yacwila, ngaphandle komkhumbi owodwa wase-Britain. Cishe abantu abangu-200 baseMelika naseJalimane balahlekelwa yizimpilo zabo.

translation.en: During the struggle for independence organised by the Mau movement, a peaceful gathering in the town resulted in the killing of the paramount chief Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.
translation.zu: Phakathi nomzabalazo wokuzimela ohlelwe yinhlangano kaMau, umhlangano wokuthula edolobheni waholela ekubulaweni kwenkosi yezwe uTupua Tamasese lealofi III.

translation.en: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas.
translation.zu: Kunezingu eziningi, ngenxa yokuthi i-Auckland ingapha nangapha kwamatheku amabili. Ezithandwa kakhulu zisezindaweni ezintathu.

translation.en: North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south.
translation.zu: Amabhisi wasoGwini oluseNyakatho (esifundeni seTheku eliseNyakatho) asoLwandlekazini lwePhasifiki futhi asuka e-Long Bay ngasenyakatho kuya e-Devonport eningizimu.

translation.en: They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees.
translation.zu: Kucishe kube izingu ezinesihlabathi eziyindawo ephephile yokubhukuda, kanti kugcwele nemithunzi eyenziwa izihlahla ze-pohutukawa.

translation.en: Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland.
translation.zu: Izingu zase-Tamaki Drive ziseThekwini lase-Waitemata, edolobheni labadla izambane likapondo e-Mission Bay naseSt Heliers e–Auckland eMaphakathi.

translation.en: These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.
translation.zu: Lawa amabhishi wemindeni aba nabantu abaningi ngezinye izikhathi anezitolo ezihlukahlukene ezigcwele ogwini. Ukubhukuda kuphephile.

translation.en: The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called "Manta".
translation.zu: Ubhiya oyinhloko wasekhaya ‘Uhamba Phambili’, awuwona ubhiya oyinkimbinkimbi, kodwa umnandi futhi uyaqabula. Omunye ubhiya wasekhaya ubizwa ngokuthi “i-Manta”.

translation.en: There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better.
translation.zu: Kunamawayini amaningi waseFulansi okuphuzwa, kodwa amawayini waseNyuzilandi kanye nase-Australia angahamba kangcono.

translation.en: The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful.
translation.zu: Amanzi asempompini yomphakathi aphephe ngokuphelele ukuthi aphuzwe, kodwa amanzi athengwayo atholakala kalula uma unokwesaba.

translation.en: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.
translation.zu: Kubantu base-Australia, umcabango wekhofi 'elinobisi oluthunqiswe ngomusi' awujwayelekile. Inkomishi encane 'yi-espresso', i-cappuccino iza igcwele ukhilimu ophezulu (hhayi ugwebu), futhi itiye liphuzwa ngaphandle kobisi.

translation.en: The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent.
translation.zu: Isiphuzo sikashokoledi esishisayo sisemazingeni waseBelgium. Iziphuzo ezenziwe ngezithelo ziyabiza kodwa zikahle kakhulu.

translation.en: Many trips to the reef are made all year around, and injuries due to any of these causes on the reef are rare.
translation.zu: Uhambo oluningi lokuya emkhombeni wekholali (reef) lwenziwa unyaka wonke, futhi izingozi ngenxa yanoma iziphi yalezi zimbangela zasemkhombeni azivamile.

translation.en: Still, take advice from authorities, obey all signs, and pay close attention to safety warnings.
translation.zu: Noma kunjalo, thatha iseluleko seziphathimandla, ulandele zonke izinkomba futhi unakisise izixwayiso sokuphepha.

translation.en: Box jellyfish occur near beaches and near river estuaries from October to April north of 1770. They can occasionally be found outside these times.
translation.zu: Ama-jellyfish asabhokisi abakhona eduze namabhishi naseduze nezizalo zemifula kusukela ngo-October kuya ku-April enyakatho ye-1770. Angatholakala ngezinye izikhathi ngaphandle kwalezi zikhathi.

translation.en: Sharks do exist, however they rarely attack humans. Most sharks are scared of humans and would swim away.
translation.zu: Oshaka abekho, nokho abavamisile ukuhlasela abantu. Oshaka abaningi besaba abantu futhi bazobhukuda babaleke.

translation.en: Saltwater Crocodiles do not actively live in the ocean, their primary habitat is in river estuaries north from Rockhampton.
translation.zu: Izingwenya zamanzi anosawoti azihlali ngokukhululeka olwandle, indawo yazo yokuhlala eyinhloko kusezizalweni zomfula enyakatho kusuka e-Rockhampton.

translation.en: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination.
translation.zu: Ukubhukha kusenesikhathi kunikeza isihambi ukuthula kwengqondo kokuthi sizoba nendawo yokulala kuyo lapho sifika endaweni esiya kuyo.

translation.en: Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent.
translation.zu: Izinkampani ezihlela uhambo kaningi ziba nezaphulelo namahhotela athile, nakuba ungakwazi ukubhukha ezinye izinhlobo zokuhlala, njengendawo yamakamu, ngenkampani ehlela uhambo.

translation.en: Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages.
translation.zu: Izinkampani ezihlela uhambo zinikeza inhlanganisela yezinto ezihlanganisa ibhulakufesi, amalungiselelo wezinto zokuthutha zokuya/zokusuka esikhumulweni sezindiza noma isethi ehlangene yendiza kanye nehhotela.

translation.en: They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa).
translation.zu: Bayakwazi ukukugcinela indawo uma wena usadinga isikhathi sokucabanga noma usafisa ukulungisa izinto ezithinta uhambo lwakho (isibonelo i-visa).

translation.en: Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.
translation.zu: Noma iziphi izinguquko noma izicelo nokho kumelwe zidluliselwe enkampanini ehlela uhambo kuqala futhi hhayi nehhotela ngokuqondile.

translation.en: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience.
translation.zu: Kweminye imikhosi, iningi lababakhona emkhosini womculo linquma ukukanisa kuleyo ndawo, futhi ababakhona abaningi bakubona kuyingxenye edingekayo yokuhlanganyela.

translation.en: If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music.
translation.zu: Uma ufuna ukubona okwenzekayo useduze kuzomelwe ufike masinya ukuze uthole indawo yokukamisa eduze nomculo.

translation.en: Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night.
translation.zu: Khumbula ukuthi nakuba umculo osesiteji esiyinhloko ungaphela, kungaba nezingxenye zomkhosi ezizoqhubeka zidlala umculo kuze kube sebusuku kakhulu.

translation.en: Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.
translation.zu: Eminye imikhosi inezindawo zokukanisa ezikhethekile zemindeni enezingane ezincane.

translation.en: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected.
translation.zu: Uma unqamula iNyakatho Baltic ebusika, bheka ukuthi ikuphi indawo yokusandlwana okwakhiwe ngezingodo, njengoba ukuhamba eqhweni kubangela ukungaphatheki kahle emakhaleni kulaba abathinteke kakhulu.

translation.en: Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).
translation.zu: Uhambo lomkhumbi lwaseSaint Petersburg luhlanganisa idolobha. Kulindelwe ukuthi abahamba ngomkhumbi bahlangabezane nezimfuneko ze-visa (hlola imigomo)

translation.en: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find.
translation.zu: Amahhlo okugembula ngokujwayelekile enza imizamo yokuba izivakashi zichithe isikhathi nemali eningi ngangokunokwenzeka. Amafasitela namakilogo ngokuvamile awekho, futhi kungaba nzima ukuthola izindawo zokuphuma.

translation.en: They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise.
translation.zu: Ngokuvamile banokudla okukhethekile, iziphuzo kanye nokuzijabulisa, ukuze bagcine izivakashi zithokozile, futhi bazigcine ziphakathi kwawo.

translation.en: Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.
translation.zu: Ezinye izindawo zihlinzeka ngotshwala ezindlini. Nokho, ukudakwa kudunga ingqondo, bonke abantu abagembulayo abahle bayakwazi ukubaluleka kokuhlala usangulukile.

translation.en: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures.
translation.zu: Noma ubani ozoshayela ezindaweni eziphakeme noma ngaphezu kwezintuba zezintaba kumelwe alindele ukuba khona kwesithwathwa, iqhwa, noma amakhaza ashubisa umkantsha.

translation.en: On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt.
translation.zu: Emigwaqweni eneqhwa kanye nomkhithiko, ukuhamba kuyabambezeleka futhi angeke ukwazi ukushayela njengalapho uhamba otiyeleni.

translation.en: During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time.
translation.zu: Uma kunomoya ohambisana neqhwa, kungawa iqhwa elanele elingakwenza ubhajwe ngesikhashana nje.

translation.en: Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows.
translation.zu: Ukubonakala kungavinjelwa ukuwa noma ukufuthwa kweqhwa noma noma ngomswakama noma iqhwa efasiteleni lemoto.

translation.en: On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.
translation.zu: Ngakolunye uhlangothi, izimo zeqhwa noma zesithwathwa zivamile emazweni amaningi, futhi izimoto zihamba ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka cishe unyaka wonke.

translation.en: Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors.
translation.zu: Amasafari mhlawumbe yinto enkulu kunazo zonke edonsa izivakashi e-Afrika futhi yinto ethandwa yizivakashi eziningi.

translation.en: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
translation.zu: Igama elithi safari ngokuvamile lisetshenziselwa ukubhekisela ohambweni lokunqamula izwe ukuze ubone izilwane zasendle ezihlaba umxhwele zase-Afrika, ikakhulukazi emathafeni.

translation.en: Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing.
translation.zu: Ezinye izilwane, njengezindlovu kanye nezindlulamithi, zithanda ukusondela ezimotweni futhi izinto zokubuka ezisezingeni elikahle zizokuvumela ukuthi uzibuke kahle.

translation.en: Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars.
translation.zu: Amabhubesi, izingulule kanye nezingwe ziyexwaya futhi uzozibona kangcono ngezingilazi zokubuka kude.

translation.en: A walking safari (also called a "bush walk", "hiking safari", or going "footing") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days.
translation.zu: Uhambo lokunqamula izwe lwezinyawo (olubuye lwaziwe ngokuthi "ukuhamba ehlathini", "i-safari yokuhamba ngezinyawo", noma "ukukhenketha") luhlanganisa uhambo olude lwezinyawo, kungaba amahora ambalwa noma izinsuku eziningana.

translation.en: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan.
translation.zu: Ama-Paralympic azokwenzeka kusukela ngomhla ka-24 Agasti kuya ku-5 Septemba 2021. Ezinye izehlakalo zizobanjelwa kwezinye izindawo eJapani yonke.

translation.en: Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964.
translation.zu: ITokyo kuzoba ilona kuphela idolobha lase-Asia eliphathe imidlalo yama-Olimpiki wasehlobo emibili, eliyiphathe ngo-1964.

translation.en: If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation.
translation.zu: Uma ubhukhe indiza kanye nendawo yokulala ngo-2020 ngaphambi kokuthi kumenyezelwe ukuhlehliswa, ungase ube sesimweni esinzima.

translation.en: Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled.
translation.zu: Izinkambiso zokukhansela ziyahluka, kodwa kusukela ngasekupheleni kukaMashi izinkampiso eziningi zokukhansela ngenxa ye-coronavirus azifiki kuJulayi 2020, ngenkathi okwakuhlelwe ngayo ama-Olimpiki.

translation.en: It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.
translation.zu: Kulindeleke ukuthi amathikithi amaningi womcimbi azobiza phakathi kuka-¥2,500 no-¥130,000, futhi amathikithi avamile abiza u-¥7,000.

translation.en: Ironing damp clothes can help them dry. Many hotels have an iron and ironing board available for loan, even if one is not present in the room.
translation.zu: Uku-ayina izingubo ezimanzi kungazisiza zome. Amahhotela amaningi ane-ayini nebhodi yoku-ayina etholakalayo ngokubolekwa, noma ngabe eyodwa ingekho egumbini.

translation.en: If an iron isn't available, or if you don't fancy wearing ironed socks, then you can try using a hairdryer, if available.
translation.zu: Uma i-ayina ingekho, noma uma ungagqoki amasokisi abizayo a-ayiniwe, ungazama ukusebenzisa umshini wokomisa izinwele, uma ukhona.

translation.en: Be careful not to allow fabric to become too hot (which can cause shrinkage, or in extreme cases, scorch).
translation.zu: Qaphela ukuba ungavumeli indwangu ukuba ishise kakhulu (okungayenza ukuthi ishwaqe, noma ezimweni ezidlulele, ihamuke).

translation.en: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats.
translation.zu: Kunezindlela eziningi zokuhlanza amanzi, ezinye ezisebenza kakhulu ngaphansi kwezimo ezithile eziwusongo.

translation.en: In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed.
translation.zu: Kwezinye izindawo ukubilisa amanzi umzuzu kwanele, kwezinye kudingeka imizuzu eminingana.

translation.en: Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.
translation.zu: Izihlungi ziyahluka ngempumelelo, uma ungaba nokukhathazeka, kumelwe ucabangele ukuthenga amanzi wakho ebhodleni elivaliwe enkampanini ethenjwayo.

translation.en: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions.
translation.zu: Izihambi zingahlangabezana nezifo zezilwane ezingazijwaleyanga ezindaweni zangakuzo.

translation.en: Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections.
translation.zu: Izilokazane zingakonakalisa ukudla, zicasule, noma okubi nakakhulu zenze kusigulise, zisakaze ubuthi, noma zisakaze izifo.

translation.en: Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.
translation.zu: Izifo ezithelelwanayo ngokwazo, noma izilwane eziyingozi ezingalimaza noma zibulale umuntu ngamandla, azivamile ukufaneleka njengezilwane ezifuywayo.

translation.en: Duty free shopping is the opportunity to buy goods exempted from taxes and excises at certain locations.
translation.zu: Ukuthenga izimpahla ezingakhokhiswa intela kuyithuba lokuthenga izimpahla ezikhishwe izintela kanye nentela yezimpahla ezindaweni ezithile.

translation.en: Travellers bound for countries with heavy taxation can sometimes save a considerable amount of money, especially on products such as alcoholic beverages and tobacco.
translation.zu: Izihambi eziya emazweni akhokhisa intela ephezulu kwesinye isikhathi zingonga imali eningi, ikakhulukazi emikhiqizweni efana neziphuzo ezidakayo nogwayi.

translation.en: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain.
translation.zu: Indawo ephakathi kwe-Point Marion ne-Fairmont yenza izimo zokushayela ezinzima kakhulu eMgwaqweni omkhulu wase-Buffalo-Pittsburgh, odlula njalo ezindaweni ezingenabantu zasemahlathini.

translation.en: If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate.
translation.zu: Uma ungajwayele ukushayela emigwaqweni yasemaphandleni, hlala uphapheme: izindawo eziyimiqansa kakhulu, izindlela eziwungcingo, kanye namajika amabi agcwele.

translation.en: Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise.
translation.zu: Ukulinganiselwa kwesivinini okusemabhodini kuphansi ngokuphawulekayo kunasezingxenyeni zangaphambili nezilandelayo — ngokuvamile u-35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — futhi ukukunakisisa kubalulekile nakakhulu kunokungakunakisisi.

translation.en: Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.
translation.zu: Ngokumangazayo, nokho, insiza yefoni ephathekayo inamandla kakhulu lapha kunezindlela eziningi eziningi zomzila, isibonelo, Izindawo Zasendle zasePennsylvania.

translation.en: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria.
translation.zu: Ukudla kwaseJalimane okubhakwayo kuhle empeleni, futhi eBavaria, kunothile futhi kuhlukile, kuyafana nalokho kwasendaweni engumakhelwane engaseningizimu, i-Austria.

translation.en: Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer.
translation.zu: Ukudla okubhakwayo kwezithelo kuvamile, okunama-apula aphekwayo afakwa ezintweni ezibhakwayo unyaka wonke, kanye nama-cherry namapulamu evela ngehlobo.

translation.en: Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee.
translation.zu: Okuningi kokudla kwaseJalimane okubhakiwe kubuye kube nama-almondi, izindlubu zomhezela, kanye nezinye izindlubu zemithi. Amakhekhe athandwayo avame ukuhambisana kahle kakhulu nenkomishi yekhofi enamandla.

translation.en: If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
translation.zu: Uma ufuna uphayi omncane kodwa onothile, zama lokho okubizwa kuye ngendawo ngokuthi iBerliner, iPfannkuchen noma iKrapfen.

translation.en: A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables.
translation.zu: Ukhari yisidlo esisuselwa kumakhambi nezinongo, kuhlanganiswe ndawonye mhlawumbe nenyama noma imifino.

translation.en: A curry can be either "dry" or "wet" depending on the amount of liquid.
translation.zu: Ukhari ungaba “manzi” noma “wome” kuya ngesikali samanzi.

translation.en: In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used.
translation.zu: Izindawo ezimaphakathi nezwe zaseNyakatho neNdiya nePakistan, i-yogathi ivamise ukusetshenziswa ezitshuliwni; eNingizimu neNdiya kanye nasezindaweni ezinye ezisogwini zezwekazi, ubisi lukakhukhunathi luvamise ukusetshenziswa.

translation.en: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation.
translation.zu: Ngeziqhingi ezingu-17,000 ongakhetha kuzo, ukudla kwase-Indonesia igama elihlanganisa izinhlobo eziningi zokudlwa kwendawo okutholakala ezweni lonke.

translation.en: But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java.
translation.zu: Kodwa, uma lisetshenziswa ngaphandle kwenye incazelo, igama livame ukusho ukudla ekuqaleni okusuka ezingxenyeni ezimaphakathi kanye nezisempumalanga yesiqhingi esiyinhloko iJava.

translation.en: Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.
translation.zu: Manje okutholakala kabanzi eqoqweni leziqhingi lonke, ukudla kwaseJava kuhlanganisa izinhlobonhlobo zokudla okunongwe kalula, lapho isinongo esivelele kubantu baseJava kungamantongomane, upelepele, ushukela (ikakhulukazi ushukela waseJava kakhukhunathi) kanye nezinye izinongo ezinamakha.

translation.en: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle.
translation.zu: Izitibili izinto zokusekela izinyawo zomgibeli ezilenga ezingxenyeni zonke zesihlalo sehhashi.

translation.en: They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them.
translation.zu: Zinikeza ukuzinza emgibelini kodwa zingaba nezinkinga zokuphepha ngenxa yamathuba okuba izinyawo zomgibeli zibhajwe kuzo.

translation.en: If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken.
translation.zu: Uma umgibeli ewiswa yihashi kodwa unyawo lwakhe lubambeke esitibilini, angahuduleka uma ihhashi libaleka. Ukunciphisa lengozi, izinyathelo ezimbalwa zokuphepha zingathathwa.

translation.en: First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole.
translation.zu: Okokuqala, abagibeli abaningi bagqoka amabhuzi okugibela anesithende kanye nesoli ebushelelezi, ecijile.

translation.en: Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.
translation.zu: Okulandelayo, ezinye izihlalo zehhashi, ngokukhethekile izihlalo zamaNgisi, zinezinsimbi zokuphepha ezivumela isikhumba sesitibili ukuba siwe esihlalweni lapho isihlalo sidonswelwa emuva umgibeli owayo.

translation.en: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags.
translation.zu: I-Cochamo Valley – indawo eyinhloko abaqhwali abafuna ukufika kuyo e-Chile, yaziwa nangokuthi i-Yosemite yaseNingizimu Melika, enezinhlobo ezihlukahlukene zezindonga ezinkulu ezakhiwe nge-granite kanye nemisele.

translation.en: Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.
translation.zu: Iziqongo zihlanganisa izindawo zokubona izindawo ezinhle kakhulu ezihlokweni. Abagibeli abavela kuzo zonke izingxenye zomhlaba bayaqhubeka ngokuthola imizila emisha phakathi kwezindawo ezingapheli ezingaba izindonga.

translation.en: Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet.
translation.zu: Izikhukhula zehle, okubandakanya skiing futhi manjehibilika eqhweni iyimidlalo ethandwayo efaka ukwehlela phansi indawo embozwe yiqhwa nge skis noma ibhodi leqhwa elinanyathe izinyawo zakho.

translation.en: Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as "ski bums," planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location.
translation.zu: Ukushushuluza eqhweni umsebenzi oyinhloko wokuhamba onabashisekeli abaningi, kwezinye izikhathi abaziwa ngokuthi "ama-ski bums," abahlela ukuvakasha konke ukuze bashushuluze eqhweni endaweni ethile.

translation.en: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!
translation.zu: Umcabango wokushushuluza eqhweni owakudala kakhulu — imidwebo yasemihumeni eveza abashushuluzi baseqhweni ihlehlela emuva ku-5000 BC!

translation.en: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
translation.zu: Ukushushuluza eqhweni wehla entabeni njengomhlalo kuhlehlela emuva okungenani ekhulwini lama-17 leminyaka, futhi ngo-1861 iqembu lokushushuluza eqhweni kokuzilibazisa lavulwa abantu baseNorway e-Australia.

translation.en: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
translation.zu: Ukushushuluza eqhweni ngesikhwama: Lokhu kubuye kubizwe ngokuthi ukushushuluza eqhweni emaphandleni, ukubona indawo ngokushushulaza eqhweni kanye nokushushuluza eqhweni kokuqwala izintaba.

translation.en: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.
translation.zu: Kuhlobene kodwa akuhlanganisi isitayela se-alpine sokuvakasha noma ukuqwala izintaba, okwenziwe abanye kamuva ezindaweni ezingamawa futhi ezidinga izinduku zokuhamba eqhweni eziqinile kakhudlwana kanye namabhuthi.

translation.en: Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route.
translation.zu: Cabanga ngendlela yokushushuluza eqhweni njengendlela efanayo yokuqwala izintaba.

translation.en: In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
translation.zu: Ezimweni ezinhle uzokwazi ukuhamba cishe ibanga elide kunokuhamba ngezinyawo – kodwa ngokwethukela okukhulu kuphela ungathola isivinini sokushushuluza eqhweni ezindaweni ezingajwayelekile ngaphandle kwesikhwama esisindayo emizileni elungisiwe.

translation.en: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
translation.zu: IYurophu izwekali elincane ngokwesilinganiso kodwa elinamazwe amaningi azimele. Ngaphansi kwezimo ezivamile, ukuthatha uhambo emazweni amaningana kungasho ukubhalisela i-visa kanye nokudlula lapho kuhlolwa khona amaphasiphoti kaningana.

translation.en: The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect.
translation.zu: Indawo yaseSchengen, nokho, isebenza ngandlelathile njengezwe elilodwa kulokhu.

translation.en: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
translation.zu: Uma nje uhlala kulendawo, ngokuvamile ungeqa imingcele ngaphandle kokuba kuhlolwe iphasiphothi yakho futhi.

translation.en: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
translation.zu: Ngokufanayo, ngokuba ne-visa ye-Schengen, awudingi ukubhalisela i-visa yezwe ngalinye ngokuhlukile kulawo angamalungu e-Shengen, okonga isikhathi, imali kanye nomsebenzi wokugcwalisa amafomu.

translation.en: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
translation.zu: Ayikho neze incazelo ekhona yokuthi lemikhiqizo eyenziwe kwabe kungeyakudala. Izinhlangano zentela zichaza izinto esezidlulelwe yiminyaka engu-100 njengama gugu.

translation.en: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
translation.zu: Incazelo inokwehluka kwendawo, lapho isilinganiso sobudala singaba sifishane ezindaweni ezinjengaseNyakatho Melika kunaseYurophu.

translation.en: Handicraft products might be defined as antiques, though they are younger than similar mass-produced goods.
translation.zu: Imikhiqizo yezandla ingahle ichazwe njengezinto zakudala, nakuba imincane kunempahla efanaya ekhiqizwa ngobuningi.

translation.en: Reindeer husbandry is an important livelihood among the Sámi and the culture surrounding the trade is important also for many with other professions.
translation.zu: Ukufuya ama-reindeer indlela ebalulekile yokuziphilisa phakathi kwamaSámi futhi isiko elizungeze lomsebenzi libalulekile futhi nakwabanye abaneminye imisebenzi.

translation.en: Even traditionally, though, not all Sámi have been involved in big scale reindeer husbandry, but lived from fishing, hunting and similar, having reindeer mostly as draft animals.
translation.zu: Ngisho nangokwesiko, nokho, akuwona wonke amaSámi ayehlanganyele ngokugcwele ekufuyeni izinyamazane, kodwa ayephila ngokudoba, ukuzingela nokufanayo, besebenzisa izinyamazane njengezilwane eziboshelwayo.

translation.en: Today many Sámi work in modern trades. Tourism is an important income in Sápmi, the Sámi area.
translation.zu: Namuhla abaningi abantu bama-Sámi abasebenza kwezohwebo zesimanje. Ezokuvakasha ngumholo obalulekile e-Sápmi, endaweni yama-Sámi.

translation.en: Though it is widely used, especially among non-Romani, the word "Gypsy" is often considered offensive because of its associations with negative stereotypes and inaccurate perceptions of Romani people.
translation.zu: Nakuba lisetshenziswa kabanzi, ikakhulukazi phakathi kwabantu abangewona amaRomany, igama elithi "Gypsy" kaningi lithathwa njengelokwedelela ngenxa yokuhlanganiswa kwalo nezinto ezimbi eziyiphutha ezishiwo abanye kanye nemibono enganembile ngabantu bamaRomany.

translation.en: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected.
translation.zu: Uma izwe ozolivakashela lithola izixwayiso zokuphepha ezingokomthetho, umshwalense wakho wohambo wempilo noma umshwalense wakho wokukhansela uhambo ungathinteka.

translation.en: You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens.
translation.zu: Ungafisa nokuhlola izeluleko zohulumeni ngaphandle kowakho, kodwa izeluleko ziklanyelwe izakhamuzi zawo.

translation.en: As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs.
translation.zu: Ngengesibonelo esisodwa, izakhamuzi zaseMelika eMpumalanga Ephakathi zingabhekana nezimo ezihlukile kunalezo zaseYurophu noma e-Arabiya.

translation.en: Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country.
translation.zu: Izeluleko zimane ziyisifinyezo esifishane sesimo sezepolotiki ezweni elilodwa.

translation.en: The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
translation.zu: Imibono eveziwe ngokuvamile eyokudlulisa amahlo, evamile kanye nelula kakhulu uma kuqhathaniswa nokwaziswa okuningiliziwe okutholakala kwezinye izindawo.

translation.en: Severe weather is the generic term for any dangerous weather phenomenon with the potential to cause damage, serious social disruption, or loss of human life.
translation.zu: Isimo sezulu esibi kumane kuyigama elilula elisho isimo sezulu esiyingozi esinamandla okudala umonakalo, ukuphazamiseka kwangempela kwenhlalakahle, noma ukufa kwabantu.

translation.en: Severe weather can occur anywhere in the world, and there are different types of it, which can depend on geography, topography, and atmospheric conditions.
translation.zu: Isimo sezulu esibi kakhulu singenzeka noma kuphi emhlabeni, futhi kunezinhlobo ezihlukile zaso, ezingaxhomeka ekumeni kwezwe, esimweni sendawo, kanye nezimo emkhathini.

translation.en: High winds, hail, excessive precipitation, and wildfires are forms and effects of severe weather, as are thunderstorms, tornadoes, waterspouts, and cyclones.
translation.zu: Imimoya ephakeme, isangqotho, isimo sezulu esidlulele, kanye nemililo yasendle ziwuhlobo nomphumela wesimo sezulu esibi kakhulu, kanjalo neziphepho, izivunguvungu, izishomo zamanzi amuncwa yisivunguvungu, kanye nezihlwithi.

translation.en: Regional and seasonal severe weather phenomena include blizzards, snowstorms, ice storms, and dust storms.
translation.zu: Izimo zezulu ezimbi zasendaweni nezenkathi ethile zihlanganisa iziphepho ezinkulu zeqhwa, izivunguvungu zeqhwa, isichotho, kanye nezivunguvungu ezinothuli.

translation.en: Travellers are strongly advised to be aware of any risk of severe weather affecting their area as they may affect any travel plans.
translation.zu: Izihambi ziyalulekwa ngokuqinile ukuthi ziqaphele noma iyiphi ingozi yesimo sezulu esibi kakhulu esithinta indawo yazo njengoba singathinta noma yiziphi izinhlelo zohambo.

translation.en: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training.
translation.zu: Noma ubani ohlela ukuvakashela izwe elizobhekwa njengesizinda sempi kumelwe athole ukuqeqeshwa okukhethekile.

translation.en: A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company.
translation.zu: Usesho kuyi-inthanethi “loKudla kwendawo embi” cishe luzonikeza ikheli lenkampani yasendaweni.

translation.en: A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience.
translation.zu: Isifundo ngokuvamile sizohlanganisa zonke izindaba okuxoxwe ngazo lapha ngokujulile, ngokuvamile ngendlela yokukusebenzisa engokoqobo.

translation.en: A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training.
translation.zu: Inkambo izohamba ngokujwayelekile kusukela ezinsukwini ezingu-2-5 futhi izobandakanya imidlalo yokulingisa, insiza yezimo eziphuthumayo eningi futhi kwesinye isikhathi ukuqeqeshwa ekusebenziseni izikhali ..

translation.en: Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.
translation.zu: Izincwadi nomagazini abakhuluma ngokuphila endle zivamile, kodwa izincwadi ezikhuluma ngezindawo zezimpi zimbalwa.

translation.en: Voyagers planning sex reassignment surgery abroad must ensure they're carrying valid documents for the return trip.
translation.zu: Izihambi ezihamba ngemikhumbi ezihlele ukushintsha ubulili bazo ngokuhlinzwa phesheya kwezilwandle kumelwe ziqinisekise ukuthi ziphethe amaphepha afanele ohambo lokubuya.

translation.en: The willingness of governments to issue passports with gender not stated (X) or documents updated to match a desired name and gender varies.
translation.zu: Ukuvuma kohulumeni ukuthi anikeze abantu amaphasiphothiangavezi ubulili (X) noma amaphepha abuyekeziwe ukuthi afane negama elithandwayo kanye nokuhluka kobulili.

translation.en: Willingness of foreign governments to honour these documents is just as widely variable.
translation.zu: Ukuzimisela kohulumeni bangaphandle ukuhlonipha lamaphepha kungokuguquguqukayo.

translation.en: Searches at security checkpoints have also become far more intrusive in the post-September 11, 2001 era.
translation.zu: Ukusesha ezindaweni zokuhlola sekube okuxhantelayo kakhulu enkathini yangemva kuka-2001, Septemba 11.

translation.en: Pre-operative transgender people should not expect to pass through the scanners with their privacy and dignity intact.
translation.zu: Abantu abazohlinzwa ukuze bashintshe ubulili babo akufanele balindele ukuthi bazodlula kumasikena ngobumfihlo babo nangesithunzi sabo sisaqinile.

translation.en: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar.
translation.zu: Imisinga yokuqhuma kungukugeleza okubuyayo okuvela emagagasini aqhamuka olwandle, ngokuvamile emadwaleni noma kokuthi akufane.

translation.en: Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there.
translation.zu: Ngenxa yethopholoji yangaphansi kwamanzi ukugeleza okubuyayo kugxile ezingxenyeni ezimbalwa ezijulile, futhi umsinga osheshayo emanzini ajulile ungakheka lapho.

translation.en: Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible.
translation.zu: Ukufa okuningi kwenzeka ngenxa yokukhathala kokuzama ukubhukuda uya emuva ngokuphambene nomsinga, okungaba yinto engenakwenzeka.

translation.en: As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally.
translation.zu: Ngokushesha ngemva kokuba uphuma emsingeni wamanzi, ukubhukudela emuva akusabi nzima ngokuvamile.

translation.en: Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.
translation.zu: Zama ukuqonda lapho ungabambekile khona futhi noma, kuye ngamakhono akho nokuthi uphawuliwe yini, ungathanda ukulinda ukutakulwa.

translation.en: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe.
translation.zu: Ukuthuka ngoba usekhaya kuza kuqala kunalokho kuthuka okwenzeka uma uvakashele endaweni ongayazi (ngakho ukujabula kuba kuncane), kuthathe isikhathi, futhi kungaya ngokuya kwande.

translation.en: Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture.
translation.zu: Izihambi ezikuthole kulula ukujwayela isiko elisha kwesinye isikhathi zikuthola kunzima ukujwayela isiko lazo lendabuko futhi.

translation.en: When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture.
translation.zu: Lapho ubuyela ekhaya usuka phesheya, kuzodingeka ujwayele isiko elisha neminye yemikhuba yakho oyilahlile kusukela ezweni lakini.

translation.en: When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt.
translation.zu: Lapho uya phesheya okokuqala, abantu kungenzeka ukuthi babebekezela futhi beqonda, bazi ukuthi izivakashi uma zifika ezweni elisha zidinga ukujwayela.

translation.en: People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.
translation.zu: Abantu kungezeka bangalindeli ukuthi ukulinda kanye nokuqonda nakho kubalulekile ezivakashini ezibuyela ekhaya.

translation.en: The pyramid sound and light show is one of the most interesting things in the area for kids.
translation.zu: Umbukiso onxa-ntathu womsindo nokukhanya ungenye yezinto ezithakazelisayo endaweni yezingane.

translation.en: You can see the pyramids in the dark and you can see them in silence before the show begins.
translation.zu: Ungabona imibhoshongo enxa-ntathu ebumnyameni futhi ungawabona lapho kuthulile ngaphambi kokuqala kombukiso.

translation.en: Usually you always here the sound of tourists and vendors. The story of the sound and light is just like a story book.
translation.zu: Ngokuvamile uhlala uzwa umsindo wezivakashi nabathengisi. Udaba lomsindo nokukhanya lufana nencwadi yezindaba.

translation.en: The Sphinx is set as the backdrop and the narrator of a long story.
translation.zu: ISphinx ibekwe njengesigcawu nomlandisi wodaba olude.

translation.en: The scenes are displayed on the pyramids and the different pyramids are lit up.
translation.zu: Izigcawu zikhonjiswa kumaphiramidi kanti amaphiramidi ahlukahlukene akhanyisiwe.

translation.en: South Shetland Islands, discovered in 1819, are claimed by several nations and have the most bases, with sixteen active in 2020.
translation.zu: Iziqhingi zaseShetland eseNyakatho, ezitholwe ngo-1819, zinezizwe eziningi ezithi ziwela kuzo futhi zinezikhungo eziningi, eziyishumi nesishiyagalolunye ezisebenzayo ngo-2020.

translation.en: The archipelago lies 120 km north of the Peninsula. The largest is King George Island with the settlement of Villa Las Estrellas.
translation.zu: I-archipelago isendaweni eqhele ngamakhilomitha angu-120 enyakatho yeNhlonhlo. Enkulu kuwo i-King George enendawo e-Villa Las Estrellas.

translation.en: Others include Livingston Island, and Deception where the flooded caldera of a still-active volcano provides a spectacular natural harbour.
translation.zu: Okunye kuhlanganisa isiqhingi seLivingston, kanye neDeception lapho imbobo enkulu egcwele udaka lwentabamlilo esaphuquka umlilo yenza itheku elimangalisayo elingokwemvelo.

translation.en: Ellsworth Land is the region south of the Peninsula, bounded by the Bellingshausen Sea.
translation.zu: IZwe lase-Ellsworth liyindawo eseningizimu neNhlonhlo, likhawuliswe uLwandle iBellingshausen.

translation.en: The mountains of the Peninsula here merge into the plateau, then re-emerge to form the 360 km chain of the Ellsworth Mountains, bisected by the Minnesota Glacier.
translation.zu: Izintaba zeNhlonhlo zihlangana enkangaleni, bese zihlangana futhi ukwakha uchungechunge lweziNtaba sase-Ellsworth, ezinqunywa phakathi yiGilesiya yase-Minnesota.

translation.en: The northern part or Sentinel Range has Antarctica's highest mountains, the Vinson Massif, peaking at 4892 m Mount Vinson.
translation.zu: Ingxenye engasenyakatho noma iSentinel Range inezintaba eziphakeme kunazo zonke zase-Antarctica, iVinson Massif, ephakeme yaba ngu-4892 m iMount Vinson.

translation.en: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option.
translation.zu: Ezindaweni ezikude, ngaphandle kwenethiwekhi yefoni esebenzayo, ifoni yesiphuphutheki kungaba yiyo kuphela into ongayisebenzisa.

translation.en: A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call.
translation.zu: Ifoni ye-satellite ngokuvamile ayithatheli ifoni ephathwayo indawo, njengoba kudingeka ube ngaphandle uqondene nesiphuphutheki ukuze ushaye ucingo.

translation.en: The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs.
translation.zu: Isevisi isetshenziswa kaningi yimikhumbi, kubandakanya umsebenzi wobungcweti, kanye nohambo olunezidingo zedatha nezwi elikude.

translation.en: Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.
translation.zu: Inkampani yezingcingo yangakini kumelwe ikwazi ukukunikeza imininingwane engeziwe mayelana nokuxhuma kulolu hlelo.

translation.en: An increasingly more popular option for those planning a gap-year is to travel and learn.
translation.zu: Indlela ethandwayo ekhulayo yalabo abahlela ukuthatha unyaka wokuphumula ekufundeni ukuthatha uhambo nokufunda.

translation.en: This is especially popular with school leavers, allowing them to take a year out before university, without compromising their education.
translation.zu: Lokhu kuthandwa kakhulu abaqeda isikole, okubavumela ukuthi bathathe unyaka ngaphambi kwenyuvesi, ngaphandle kokuyekethisa imfundo yabo.

translation.en: In many cases, enrolling on a gap-year course abroad can actually improve your chances of moving into higher education back in your home country.
translation.zu: Ezimweni eziningi, ukubhalisa esifundweni sonyaka wokuphumula ngemva kwesikole kwelinye izwe empeleni kuthuthukisa amathuba akho okuya emfundweni ephakeme emuva ezweni lakini.

translation.en: Typically there will be a tuition fee to enroll in these educational programs.
translation.zu: Ngokujwayelekile kuzoba nemali yokukhokhela izifundo yokubhalisa kulezi zinhelo zemfundo.

translation.en: Finland is a great boating destination. The "Land of a thousand lakes" has thousands of islands too, in the lakes and in the coastal archipelagos.
translation.zu: IFinland indawo ekahle yokuhamba ngesikebhe. "I-Lake of a thousand lakes" ineziqhingi eziyizinkulungwane futhi, emachibini kanye nasemaqoqweni eziqhingi ezingasogwini.

translation.en: In the archipelagos and lakes you do not necessarily need a yacht.
translation.zu: Edlanzaneni leziqhingi nasemachibini awudingi isikebhe.

translation.en: Although the coastal archipelagos and the biggest lakes are indeed big enough for any yacht, smaller boats or even a kayak offer a different experience.
translation.zu: Yize iziqhingi ezingasogwini kanye namachibi amakhulu kunawo wonke emakhulu ngokwanele ukuthwala noma imuphi umkhumbi kanokusho, izikebhe ezincane noma ngisho ne-kayak inikeza okwenzekayo okuhlukile.

translation.en: Boating is a national pastime in Finland, with a boat to every seven or eight people.
translation.zu: Ukuhamba ngezikebhe indlela yokuzilibazisa yezwe eFinland, ngesikebhe kubantu abayisikhombisa noma abayisishiyagalombili.

translation.en: This is matched by Norway, Sweden and New Zealand, but otherwise quite unique (e.g. in the Netherlands the figure is one to forty).
translation.zu: Lokhu kufana ne-Norway, i-Sweden kanye neNyuzilandi, kodwa ngaphandle kwalokho kuhlukile ngempela (isib. E-Netherlands isibalo okukodwa kuya kwezingamashumi amane).

translation.en: Most of the distinct Baltic Cruises feature an extended stay in St. Petersburg, Russia.
translation.zu: Iningi lweMikhumbi yokuVakasha yase-Baltic ehlukile ihlanganisa ukuhlala isikhathi eside e-St. Petersburg, e-Russia.

translation.en: This means you can visit the historic city for a couple of full days while returning and sleeping on the ship at night.
translation.zu: Lokhu kusho ukuthi ungavakashela idolobha elingokomlando izinsuku ezimbalwa ezigcwele ube ubuyela futhi ulala emkhumbini ebusuku.

translation.en: If you only go ashore using shipboard excursions you will not need a separate visa (as of 2009).
translation.zu: Uma uya ogwini kuphela usebenzisa uhambo lomkhumbi olufishane angeke udinge i-visa ehlukile (kusukela ngo-2009).

translation.en: Some cruises feature Berlin, Germany in the brochures. As you can see from the map above Berlin is no where near the sea and a visit to the city is not included in the price of the cruise.
translation.zu: Eminye imikhumbi yokuvakasha iveza i-Berlin, eseJalimane ezincwajaneni zayo. Njengoba ubona ebalazweni ngenhla i-Berlin ikude kakhulu nolwandle futhi ukuvakashela idolobha akuhlanganisiwe enanini lomkhumbi wokuvakasha.

translation.en: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event.
translation.zu: Ukuhamba ngendiza kungaba isenzakalo esithusayo kubantu beminyaka yonke nezizinda zonke, ikakhulukazi uma bengakahambi ngendiza ngaphambili noma uma behlangabezane nesenzakalo esishaqisayo.

translation.en: It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have.
translation.zu: Akuyona into yokuba namahloni ngayo: ayihlukile ezintweni ezisatshwa abantu ngabanye abaningi nalezo abangazithandi.

translation.en: For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.
translation.zu: Kwabanye abantu, ukuzwisisa okuthile kokuthi indiza isebenza kanjani nokuthi kwenzekani phakathi nokundiza kungabasiza ukuthi banqobe ukwesaba okusekelwe ezintweni ezingaziwa noma ukungaphathi izintambo.

translation.en: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair.
translation.zu: Izinkampani ezithutha impahla zikhokhelwa kahle ngokuthumela impahla ngokushehsa. Ngokuvamile, isikhathi sibalulekile ngamaphepha ebhizinisi, impahla ethengwayo ukuze idayiswe noma enye impahla edingekayo ukuze kwenziwe ukulungisa okusheshayo.

translation.en: On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem.
translation.zu: Kwezinye izindlela, izinkampani ezinkudlwana zinezindiza zazo, kodwa kwezinye izindlela nezinkampani ezincane bekunezinkinga.

translation.en: If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs.
translation.zu: Uma bebathumele zonke izinto ngebhanoyi, kwezinye izindlela bekuzothatha izinsuku ukwehlisa imithwalo nokudlula kwabahlola amaphepha.

translation.en: The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.
translation.zu: Indlela elula yokuyingenisa ngokushesha ukuthi uyithumele njengomthwalo ohloliwe. Imithetho yezinkampani zezindiza angeke ibavumele ukuthumela umthwalo ngaphandle komgibeli, okuyilapho ungena khona.

translation.en: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you).
translation.zu: Indlela esobala yokugibela egumbini lendiza elibizayo noma labebhizinisi ukukhipha imali eningi yalelo lungelo (noma, okugcono, wenze inkampani yakho ikwenzele lokho).

translation.en: However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class!
translation.zu: Noma kunjalo, lokhu akufiki kalula: njengomthetho obekiwe, ungalindela ukukhokha izikhathi eziphindwe kane kunenani elivamile lomnotho webhizinisi, kanye nezikhathi eziyishumi nanye ezingeni lokuqala!

translation.en: Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B.
translation.zu: Ngokuvamile, akusizi ngisho nokufuna izaphulelo ezihlalweni zabebhizinisi noma ezinethezekile ohabweni lwendiza oluqondile olusuka ku-A luye ku-B.

translation.en: Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.
translation.zu: Izinkampani zezindiza zazi kahle ukuthi kuneqembu elithile eliyisisekelo labagibeli bezindiza abazimisele ukukhokha ama-dollar aphezulu ukuze bathole ilungelo lofika endaweni ethile ngokushesha futhi ngokunethezeka, futhi babakhokhisa ngokufanele.

translation.en: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used.
translation.zu: Inhlokodolobha yaseMoldova yiChișinău. Ulimi lwendawo isiRomaniya, kodwa isiRashiya sisetshenziswa kabanzi.

translation.en: Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict.
translation.zu: I-Moldova iriphabhuliki yezinhlanga eziningi ehlushwe imibango yobuhlanga.

translation.en: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
translation.zu: Ngo-1994, lombango waholela ekumenyezelweni kweRiphabhuliki yokuzimisa yaseTransnistria empumalanga Moldova, enohulumeni wayo nohlobo lwemali kodwa engaqashelwa yinoma yiliphi izwe eliyilungu le-UN.

translation.en: Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations.
translation.zu: Izixhumanisi zezomnotho zenziwe kabusha phakathi kwalezi zingxenye zase-Moldova yize behlulekile ezinxoxweni zepolitiki.

translation.en: The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.
translation.zu: Ubunikazi bawo abukaziwa okwamanje njengoba akekho.

translation.en: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub.
translation.zu: I-İzmir iyidolobha lesithathu ngobukhulu e-Turkey elinabantu abangaba izigidi ezingu-3.7, isikhungo esikhulu sesibili ngemva kwe –Istanbul, okuyindawo enezokuthutha ezikahle.

translation.en: Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains.
translation.zu: Kuqala okwakuyidolobha laseSmirna, manje kuyisikhungo sokuhweba sesimanje, esithuthukile, kanye nesiphithizelayo, esisethekwini elikhulu futhi nesizungezwe izintaba.

translation.en: The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.
translation.zu: Umgwaqo obanzi okakwe izihlahla, izakhiwe ezinezingilazi ezinkulu kanye nendawo nezikhungo zezitolo zinophahla olungokwesiko olubomvu, imakethe yangekhulu lama-18 leminyaka, kanye namathempeli namasonto, nakuba idolobha linomoya omningi weYurophu yaseMedithera kunaseTheki engokwesiko.

translation.en: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church.
translation.zu: Umuzi waseHaldarsvík unezindlela zokubona isiqhingi esiseduze sase-Eysturoy futhi unesonto elingavamile elinezinhlangothi eziyisishiyagalombili.

translation.en: In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs.
translation.zu: Egcekeni lesonto, kunemifanekiso yemabula ethakazelisayo yamajuba phezu kwamathuna amanye.

translation.en: It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.
translation.zu: Kuyifanele ingxenye yehora ukuhambahamba emzaneni othakazelisayo.

translation.en: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron.
translation.zu: Ngasenyakatho futhi efinyeleleka kalula idolobha elinezabathandanayo nelithakazelisayo laseSintra elenziwa laduma ebantwini bakwamanye amazwe ngemva komlando walo okuhle wobukhazikhazi balo obhalwe iNkosi uByron.

translation.en: Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca.
translation.zu: Ibhasi le-Scotturb 403 liya eSintra njalo, lima eKhabo da Rokha.

translation.en: Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.
translation.zu: Futhi ngasenyakatho vakashela Indawo Engcwele enkulu yeNkosazane Yethu uFatima (indawo yokukhulekela), indawo yemifanekiso kaMariya edumile emhlabeni jikelele.

translation.en: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population.
translation.zu: Siza ukhumbule ukuthi empeleni uvakashela ithuna okungcwatshwe kulo abantu abaningi, kanye nendawo ebaluleke kakhulu kubantu abaningi basemhlabeni.

translation.en: There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike.
translation.zu: Kusenabesilisa kanye nabesifazane abaningi abaphilayo abahlala lapha, kanye nabaningi abanabathandekayo babo ababulewe noma abasebenze baze bafela lapha, amaJuda kanye nokungebona amaJuda ngokufanayo.

translation.en: Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis.
translation.zu: Siza uphathe le ngosi ngaso sonke isithunzi, isizotha kanye nenhlonipho eyifanele. Ungenzi amahlaya ngokuQothulwa kwesizwe noma ama-Nazi.

translation.en: Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.
translation.zu: Musa ukungcolisa isiza ngokuphawula noma ukwenza imifanekiso esodongeni ezakhiweni.

translation.en: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish.
translation.zu: Izilimi ezingokomthetho zase-Barcelona isi-Catalan nesiSpeyini. Cishe ingxenye ithanda ukukhuluma isi-Catalan, iningi liyasizwisisa, futhi cishe wonke umuntu uyasazi isiSpeyini.

translation.en: However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language.
translation.zu: Nokho, izimpawu eziningi ziboniswe kuphela ngesi-Catalan ngoba simiswe ngokomthetho njengolimi lokuqala olungokomthetho.

translation.en: Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities.
translation.zu: Nokho, isiPeyini sibuye sisetshenziswe kabanzi ezithuthini zomphakathi kanye nakwezinye izindawo.

translation.en: Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
translation.zu: Izaziso ezivamile eDolobheni Elikhulu zenziwa ngesi-Catalan kuphela, kodwa iziphazamiso ezingahleliwe zimenyezelwa ngohlelo lomshini ngezilimi eziningi ukuhlanganisa isi-Speyini, isiNgisi, isiFulentshi, isi-Arabhiya kanye nesiJapani.

translation.en: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant.
translation.zu: Abantu basePherisi banedumela lokuqhosha, ukuba luhlaza kanye nokuzidla.

translation.en: While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is "bien élevé" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier.
translation.zu: Nakuba lokhu kaningi kuyinto eshiwo abanye enganembile, indlela enhle yokuphila eParis kusase ukuziphatha kahle, uziphathe njengomuntu o-"bien élevé" (okhuliswe kahle). Kuzokwenza ukuphila kube lula kakhulu.

translation.en: Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies.
translation.zu: Ingaphandle eliluhlaza labantu baseParis lizonyamalala ngokushesha uma uveza imikhuba emihle eyisisekelo.

translation.en: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation.
translation.zu: Ipaki lezwe lePlitvice Lakes ligcwele izihlahla kakhulu, ngokuyinhloko line-beech, i-spruce, kanye nezihlahla ze-fir, futhi inenhlanganisela yezimila zase-Alps kanye naseMedithera.

translation.en: It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude.
translation.zu: Inezinhlobo eziningi eziphawulekayo zemiphakathi yezitshalo, ngenxa yokwahluka kwesimo sezilu sayo esikahle, umhlabathi ongafani kanye namazinga okuphakama ahlukile.

translation.en: The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species.
translation.zu: Lendawo ibuye ibe yikhaya lezinhlobo ezingi zezilwane kanye nezinyoni.

translation.en: Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species
translation.zu: Izilwane eziyivelakancane ezinjengebhere elinsundu laseYurophu, impisi efana nenketshane, ukhozi, isikhova, indabushe, ikati lasendle kanye ne-capercaillie zingatholakala lapho, kanye nezinye izinhlobo ezivamile.

translation.en: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too.
translation.zu: Lapho bevakashela amamonasteli, abesifazane kudingeka bagqoke iziketi ezemboza amadolo futhi bamboze namahlombe wabo.

translation.en: Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance.
translation.zu: Amamonasteli amaningi anezembozo zabesifazane abeza bangalungile, kodwa uma uza nesakho, ikakhulukazi esinemibala ekhanyayo, ungamomothekelwa indela lowesilisa noma elesifazane esangeweni.

translation.en: Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees.
translation.zu: Ngokufanayo, abesilisa kumelwe bagqoke amabhulukwe azombhoza amadolo abo.

translation.en: This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!
translation.zu: Lokhu futhi kungabolekwa ezimpahleni ezisendaweni yokungena kodwa leyo mpahla ayihlanzwa ngemva komsebenzisi ngamunye ngakho kungenzeka ungazizwa ukhululekile ukugqoka lesi siketi. Usayizi owodwa olingana amadoda onke!

translation.en: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout.
translation.zu: Ukudla kwaseMajorca, njengokwasezindaweni ezifanayo eMedithera, kusekelwe esikweni, imifino kanye nenyama (ingulube ikakhulukazi), futhi kusebenzisa amafutha omnqumo njalo.

translation.en: A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.
translation.zu: Idina elilula elithandwayo, ikhakhulukazi phakathi nehlobo, yiPa amb Oli: Isinkwa namafutha omnqumo, utamatisi, kanye nanoma yiziphi izinongo ezikhona njengoshizi, inhlanzi ye-tuna, njalo njalo.

translation.en: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence.
translation.zu: Wonke amabizo, kanye negama elithi Sie kuwe, ahlala aqala ngosonhlamvukazi, ngisho noma ephakathi komusho.

translation.en: This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects.
translation.zu: Lena indlela enhle yokuhlukanisa phakathi kwezenzo ezinye kanye nezinto.

translation.en: It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.
translation.zu: Ngokobufakazi obukhona kwenza ukufunda kube lula, nakuba ukubhala ngandlelathile kwenziwa inkimbinkimbi ngenxa yesidingo sokuthola ukuthi isenzo noma isiphawulo sisetshenziswa ngohlobo oluphathelene nosobizo.

translation.en: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written
translation.zu: Ukuphimisela cishe kulula ngesiNtaliyane njengoba amagama amaningi aphinyiselwa ngedlela efanayo nabhalwe ngayo

translation.en: The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel.
translation.zu: Izinhlamvu eziyinhloko okumelwe uziqaphele u-c no-g, njengoba ukuziphimisela kuhluka ngokusekelwe kunkamisa olandelayo.

translation.en: Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.
translation.zu: Qiniseka ukuthi ubiza uhlamvu u-r kanye nezinhlamvu u-rr ngokuhlukile: u-caro usho ukuthi othandekayo, kuyilapho u-carro esho inqola.

translation.en: Persian has a relatively easy and mostly regular grammar.
translation.zu: UmPheresiya unegrama ngokuyisilinganiso elula nevamile kakhulu.

translation.en: Therefore, reading this grammar primer would help you learn much about Persian grammar and understand phrases better.
translation.zu: Ngakho-ke, ukufunda lencwadi yokusiza ukufunda uhlelo lolimi kungakusiza ufunde okuningi ngohlelo lolimi lwesiPheresiya futhi uqonde imisho kangcono.

translation.en: Needless to say, if you know a Romance language, it will be easier for you to learn Portuguese.
translation.zu: Akungabazeki ukuthi, uma wazi ulimi loThando, kuyoba lula ngawe ukufunda isiPutukezi.

translation.en: However, people who know a little Spanish may hastily conclude that Portuguese is close enough that it need not be studied separately.
translation.zu: Nokho, abantu abazi ulimi lwesiPeyini kancane bangashesha baphethe ngokuthi isiPutukezi siseduze kakhulu kangangokuthi akudingeki ukusifunda ngokuhlukile.

translation.en: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education.
translation.zu: Izinto zangaphambi kwenkathi yamanje ngokuvamile azisasetshenziswa namuhla, futhi zihlala kumamyuziyamu, noma izindawo zokufundisa.

translation.en: As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times.
translation.zu: Njengoba ukuphazamisa kokukhanya ngesikhathi sokudlondlobala kwazo kwakungeyona inkinga okuyiyona namuhla, ngokuvamile zitholakala emadolobheni noma ezikoleni, zitholakala kalula kunalezo ezakhiwe ngezikhathi zanamuhla.

translation.en: Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.
translation.zu: Izindawo eziningo ezaziwayo zesibonakude ziyizindawo ezingaziwa ezindaweni ezinesimo esithandekayo.

translation.en: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century.
translation.zu: Ukubuka ama-cherry eqhakaza, okwaziwa ngokuthi i-hanami, kube ingxenye yesiko laseJapani kusukela ngekhulu lama-8 leminyaka.

translation.en: The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice.
translation.zu: Umcabango uvela eShayina lapho izimbali zepulamu kwakuyimbali ethandwayo.

translation.en: In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.
translation.zu: EJapani, imicimbi yokuqala yokuqhakaza kwama-cherry yabungazwa umbusi eyibungazela yena kuphela kanye namanye amalungu ohlobo lobukhosi lwasezweni Esigodlweni saseBukhosini.

translation.en: Plants look their best when in a natural environment, so resist the temptation to remove even "just one" specimen.
translation.zu: Izitshalo zibukeka kahle kakhulu lapho zisendaweni yazo engokwemvelo, ngakho gwema isilingo sokususa nesifanekiso “esisodwa nje”.

translation.en: If visiting a formally arranged garden, collecting "specimens" is also going to get you ejected, without discussion.
translation.zu: Uma ukuvakashela ingadi ehlelwe ngokomthetho, ukuqoqa "izifanekiso" kuzobuye kukwenze ukhishwe, ngaphandle kwengxoxo.

translation.en: Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving.
translation.zu: I-Singapore ngokuvamile iyindawo ephephile kakhulu ukuba kuyo kanye nokulula ukuhamba kuyo, futhi ungakwazi ukuthenga cishe noma yini ngemva kokufika.

translation.en: But being placed in the "high tropics" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely).
translation.zu: Uma ubekwe “emazweni aphezulu anokushisa okukhulu” amadigiliyi ambalwa nje enyakatho nenkabazwe kuzodingeka ubhekane nokushisa (njalo) kanye nelanga elishisa kakhulu (lapho libalele, okungavamisanga ukwenzeka).

translation.en: There are also a few buses going north to Hebron, the traditional burial place of the Biblical patriarchs Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, and their wives.
translation.zu: Kubuye kube namabhasi ambalwa aya enyakatho eHebroni, indawo engokwesiko yokungcwaba izinzalamizi zaseBhayibhelini u-Abrahamu, u-Isaka, u-Jakobe, kanye namakhosikazi wabo.

translation.en: Check that the bus you are thinking of taking goes into Hebron and not just to the nearby Jewish settlement of Kiryat Arba.
translation.zu: Hlola ukuthi ibhasi ocabanga ukuligibela liya eHebroni yini futhi hhayi indawo yamaJuda eseduze yaseKiryat Arba.

translation.en: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around.
translation.zu: Imisele yamanzi emaphakathi nezwe kungaba umbono omuhle wokusekela iholide kuwo.

translation.en: For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal.
translation.zu: Ngokwesibonelo ukuvakashela izigodlo eSigodini saseLoire, isigodi saseRhine noma ukuthatha uhambo ngomkhumbi oluya emadolobheni athakazelisayo kuyiDanube noma ukuhamba ngesikebhe kuyi-Erie Canal.

translation.en: They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.
translation.zu: Babuye basho nezindlela zemizila yokuqwala izintaba nokuhamba ngamabhisikili.

translation.en: Christmas is one of the most important holidays of Christianity, and is celebrated as the birthday of Jesus.
translation.zu: UKhisimusi elinye lamaholide abalulekile ebuKristwini, futhi ligujwa njengosuku lokuzalwa kukaJesu.

translation.en: Many of the traditions surrounding the holiday have been adopted also by non-believers in Christian countries and non-Christians around the world.
translation.zu: Amasiko amaningi ahlobene namaholide amukelwe abantu abangewona amakholwa emazweni wobuKhristu emhlabeni jikelele.

translation.en: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise.
translation.zu: Kukhona isiko lokuhlala ungalali kuze kuhlwe ngobusuku bePhasika endaweni ethile ukuze ubone ukuphuma kwelanga.

translation.en: There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual.
translation.zu: Ngokuqinisekile kunezincazelo ezingokwenkolo yobuKrestu zaleli siko, kodwa kungenzeka kube isiko langaphambi kobuKrestu laseNtwasahlobo lokuZala.

translation.en: More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.
translation.zu: Amaningi amasonto akudala asazibamba Izinkonzo zePhasika njalo ngoMgqibelo ebusuku ngesikhathi sempelasonto yePhasika, nebandla nalo libungaze ngokuhlanganyela ezinzulwini zobusuku kubungazwa ukuvuka kukaKrestu.

translation.en: All animals that originally arrived in the islands came here either by swimming, flying or floating.
translation.zu: Izilwane ezafika eziqhingini ekuqaleni zafika lapha ngokubhukuda, ngokundiza noma ngokuntanta.

translation.en: Due to the long distance from the continent mammals were unable to make the journey making the giant tortoise the primary grazing animal in the Galapagos.
translation.zu: Ngenxa yebanga elide kusuka ezwekazini izilwane ezincelisayo bezingakwazi ukuthatha uhambo okwenza ukuba izimfudu ezinkulu kakhulu zibe yizilwane eziklabayo eziyinhloko kumaGalapagos.

translation.en: Since the arrival of man to the Galapagos, many mammals have been introduced including goats, horses, cows, rats, cats and dogs.
translation.zu: Kusukela ekufikeni kwabantu eQoqweni Leziqhingi, izilwane ezincelisayo eziningi zalethwa kuhlanganise nezimbuzi, amahhashi, izinkomo, amagundane, amakati kanye nezinja.

translation.en: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon.
translation.zu: Uma uvakashela izindawo zase-Arctic noma e-Aantarctic ebusika ungabona ubusuku obuthatha amahora angaphezu kuka-24, okusho ukuthi ilanga alisi ngaphezu komkhathizwe.

translation.en: This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock.
translation.zu: Lokhu kunikeza ithuba elihle lokubona Ukukhanya okunqabile okuye kuvele esibhakabhakeni esiphezulu, njengoba isibhakabhaka sizofiphala cishe usuku lonke.

translation.en: As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.
translation.zu: Njengoba izindawo zingahlali abantu abaningi, nokuphazamisa kokukhanya kungavamanga ukuba inkinga, uzokwazi futhi ukujabulela izinkanyezi.

translation.en: Japanese work culture is more hierarchical and formal that what Westerners may be used to.
translation.zu: Isiko lokusebenza laseJapani ligxile ezikhundleni kakhulu futhi lihlelekile kunalokho labo abahlala emazweni aseNtshonalanga okungenzeka ukuthi bakujwayele.

translation.en: Suits are standard business attire, and coworkers call each other by their family names or by job titles.
translation.zu: Amasudi ayindlela yokugqoka evamile ebhizinisini, futhi abasebenza ndawonye babizana ngezibongo zabo noma ngohlobo lomsebenzi.

translation.en: Workplace harmony is crucial, emphasizing group effort rather than praising individual accomplishments.
translation.zu: Ukusebenza ngokubambisana endaweni yokusebenzela kubalulekile, ukugcizelela ukusebenza njengeqembu kunokutusa umuntu ofeze okuthile.

translation.en: Workers must often get their superiors' approval for any decisions they make, and are expected to obey their superiors' instructions without question.
translation.zu: Abasebenzi kumele kaningi bathole imvume yabaphathi babo nganoma yiziphi izinqumo ebazenzayo, futhi kulindeleke ukuthi balalele imiyalo yabaphathi babo ngale kokuthini.
